GSP33brssbh4u:5: tṛtīye adhyāye parā aparāsu vidyāsu sādhana āśrayo vicāraḥ prāyeṇātyagāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:8: prathamaṃ tāvat katibhiḥ cidadhikaraṇaiḥ sādhana āśrayavicāraśeṣameva anusarāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:9: 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.21)
GSP33brssbh4u:12: iti ca evamādiśravaṇeṣu saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ sakṛt pratyayaḥ kartavya āhosvit āvṛttya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:13: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ sakṛt pratyayaḥ syāt prayājādivat /
GSP33brssbh4u:16: nanu asakṛt upadeśā udāhṛtāḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavya iti evamādayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:17: evam api yāvat śabdam āvartayet sakṛt śravaṇaṃ sakṛt mananaṃ sakṛt nididhyāsanaṃ ca iti na atiriktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:18: sakṛt upadeśeṣu tu veda upāsīta iti evamādiṣu anāvṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:21: 'śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' iti evañjātīyako hi asakṛt upadeśaḥ pratyayāvṛttiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:22: nanu uktaṃ yāvat śabdameva āvartayet na adhikam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:25: darśanaparyavasānāni hi śravaṇādīni āvartyamānāni dṛṣṭārthāni bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:27: api ca upāsanaṃ nididhyāsanaṃ ca iti atyantarṇītāvṛttiguṇa eva kriyābhidhīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:28: tathā hi - loke gurum upāste rājānam upāsta iti ca yaḥ tātparyeṇa gurvādīn anuvartate sa evam ucyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:29: tathā dhyāyati proṣitanāthā patim iti yā nirantara smaraṇā patiṃ prati sā utkaṇṭhā sā evam abhidhīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:30: vidyupāstyoḥ ca vedānteṣu avyatirekeṇa prayogo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:31: kvacit vidinā upakramya upāsina upasaṃharati yathā - 'yastadveda yatsa veda sa mayaitaduktaḥ' (chā. 4.1.4)
GSP33brssbh4u:32: iti atra 'anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatāmupāḥse' (chā. 5.2.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:33: kvacit ca upāsina upakramya vidinā upasaṃharati yathā - 'mano brahmetyupāsīta' (chā. 3.18.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:34: iti atra 'bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.18.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:42: iti raśmibahutva vijñānaṃ bahuputratāyai vidadhat siddhavat pratyayāvṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:44: atra āha - bhavatu nāma sādhyaphaleṣu pratyayeṣu āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:46: yaḥ tu parabrahmaviṣayaḥ pratyayo nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvameva ātmabhūtaṃ paraṃ brahma samarpayati tatra kim arthāvṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:47: sakṛt śrutau ca brahma ātmatvapratīti anupapatteḥ āvṛtti abhyupagama iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:51: iti evañjātīyakaṃ vākyaṃ sakṛt śrūyamāṇaṃ brahmātmatva pratītiṃ na utpādayet tataḥ tadeva āvartyamānam utpādayiṣyati iti kā pratyāśā syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:52: atha ucyeta na kevalaṃ vākyaṃ kañcidarthaṃ sākṣātkartuṃ śaknoti ato yuktyapekṣaṃ vākyam anubhāvayiṣyati brahmātmatvam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:54: sā api hi yuktiḥ sakṛt pravṛttaiva svam artham anubhāvayiṣyati /
GSP33brssbh4u:55: athāpi syāt uktyā vākyena ca sāmānyaviṣayameva vijñānaṃ kriyate na viśeṣaviṣayam /
GSP33brssbh4u:56: yathā asti me hṛdaye śūlam ityato vākyāt gātra kampādi liṅgāt ca śūlasadbhāva sāmānyameva paraḥ pratipadyate na viśeṣam anubhavati yathā sa eva śūlī /
GSP33brssbh4u:57: viśeṣa anubhavaḥ ca avidyāyā nivartakaḥ tataḥ tadartha āvṛttiḥ iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:59: asakṛt api tāvat mātre kriyamāṇe viśeṣavijñāna utpatti asaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:60: na hi sakṛt prayuktābhyāṃ śāstrayuktibhyām anavagato viśeṣaḥ śatakṛtvaḥ api prayujyamānābhyām avagantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:61: tasmāt yadi śāstrayuktibhyāṃ viśeṣaḥ pratipādyate yadi vā sāmānyameva ubhayathā api sakṛt pravṛtte eva te svakāryaṃ kuruta iti āvṛtti anupayogaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:62: na ca sakṛt prayukte śāstrayuktī kasyacit api anubhavaṃ na utpādayata iti śakyate niyantuṃ vicitraprajñatvāt pratipattṛṇām /
GSP33brssbh4u:63: api ca aneka aṃśopete laukike padārthe sāmānya viśeṣavat ekena avadhānena ekam aṃśam avadhārayati apareṇa aparam iti syāt api abhyāsa upayogo yathā dīrghaprapāṭhakagrahaṇādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:64: na tu nirviśeṣe brahmaṇi sāmānya viśeṣarahite caitanyamātrātmake pramā utpattau abhyāsāpekṣā yukta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:65: atra ucyate - bhavet āvṛtti ānarthakyaṃ taṃ prati yaḥ tattvamasi iti sakṛt uktameva brahmātmatvam anubhavituṃ śaknuyāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:66: yastu na śaknoti taṃ pratyupayujyata eva āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:70: ādāśaṅkā kāraṇaṃ nirākṛtya tattvamasi iti eva asakṛt upadiśate /
GSP33brssbh4u:73: nanu uktaṃ sakṛt śrutaṃ cet tattvamasi vākyaṃ svam artham anubhāvayituṃ na śaknoti tata āvartyamānam api na eva śakṣyati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:76: dṛśyante hi sakṛt śrutāt vākyāt mandapratītaṃ vākyārtham āvartayantaḥ tat tat ābhāsavyudāsena samyak pratipadyamānāḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:77: api ca tattvamasi iti etat vākyaṃ tvaṃ padārthasya tat padārthabhāvam ācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh4u:78: tat padena ca prakṛtaṃ sat brahma īkṣitṛ jagato janmādikāraṇam abhidhīyate 'satyaṃ jñānamananta brahma' (tai. 2.1.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:88: anubhāvātmako brahmasaṃjñakaḥ tat padārtho vedānta abhiyuktānāṃ prasiddhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:89: tathā tvaṃpadārthaḥ api pratyagātmā śrotā dehāt ārabhya pratyagātmatayā saṃbhāvyamānaḥ caitanyaparyantatvena avadhāritaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:90_0: tatra yeṣām etau padārthau ajñāna saṃśaya viparyaya pratibaddhau teṣāṃ tatvamasi
GSP33brssbh4u:90_1: ityetat vākyaṃ svārthe pramāṃ na utpādayituṃ śaknoti padārthajñānapūrvakatvāt vākyārthasya
GSP33brssbh4u:91_0: yadyapi ca pratipattavya ātmā niraṃśaḥ tathā api adhyāropitaṃ tasmin bahu aśatvaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:91_1: deha indriya mano buddhi viṣaya vedanādi lakṣaṇaṃ tatra ekena avadhānena ekam aṃśam
GSP33brssbh4u:91_2: apohati apareṇa aparam iti yujyate tatra kramavatī pratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:93_0: yeṣāṃ punaḥ nipuṇamatīnāṃ na ajñānasaṃśayaviparyayalakṣaṇaḥ padārthaviṣayaḥ pratibandhaḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:93_1: asti te śaknuvanti sakṛt uktameva tattvamasi vākyārtham anubhavitum iti tān pratyāvṛtti
GSP33brssbh4u:94: sakṛt utpanna eva hi ātmapratipattiḥ avidyāṃ nivartayati iti na atra kaścit api kramaḥ abhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:95: satyamevaṃ yujyeta yadi kasyacit evaṃ pratipattiḥ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh4u:97: ato na duḥkhitvādi abhāvaṃ kaścit pratipadyata iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:99: dehādi abhimānavat duḥkhitvādi abhimānasya mithyā abhimānatva upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:100: pratyakṣaṃ hi dehe chidyamāne dahyamāne vā ahaṃ chidye dahya iti ca mithyā abhimāno dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:101: tathā bāhyatareṣu api putramitrādiṣu saṃtapyamāneṣu ahameva saṃtapya ityadi āropo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:103: dehādivat eva caitanyāt bahiḥ upalabhamānatvāt duḥkhitvādīnāṃ suṣuptādiṣu ca ananuvṛtteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:104: caitanyasya tu suṣupte api anuvṛttim āmananti 'yadvai tanna paśyati paśyanvai tanna paśyati' (bṛ. 4.3.23) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh4u:105: tasmāt sarvaduḥkhavinirmukta ekacaitanyātmakaḥ aham ityeṣa ātmānubhavaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:106: na ca evam ātmānam anubhavataḥ kiñcit anyat kṛtyam avaśiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:107: tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssbh4u:110: ātmanyeva ca saṃtuṣṭasya kāryaṃ na vidyate' (gī. 3.17) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:111: yasya tu na eṣaḥ anubhavo drāgiva jāyate taṃ pratyanubhavārtha eva āvṛtti abhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:112: tatra api na tattvamasi vākyārthāt pracyāvyāvṛttau pravartayet /
GSP33brssbh4u:114: niyuktasya ca asmin adhikṛtaḥ ahaṃ kartā mayā idaṃ mandam apratibhānāt taṃ brahmapratyayāt viparītapratyaya utpadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:115: yaḥ tu svayameva mandamatiḥ apratibhānāt taṃ vākyārthaṃ jihāset tasya etasmin eva vākyārthe sthirīkāra āvṛttyādi vāco yuktyā abhyupeyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:116: tasmāt parabrahmaviṣaye api pratyaye tat upāya upadeśeṣu āvṛttisiddhiḥ // 2 //
GSP33brssbh4u:120: yaḥ śāstroktaviśeṣaṇa paramātmā sa kim aham iti grahītavyaḥ kiṃvā mat anya iti etat vicārayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:121: kathaṃ punaḥ ātmaśabde pratyagātmaviṣaye śrūyamāṇe saṃśaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:122: ucyate - ayam ātmaśabdo mukhyaḥ śakyate abhyupagantuṃ sati jīva īśvarayoḥ abhedasaṃbhava itarathā tu gauṇaḥ ayam abhyupagantavya iti manyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:123: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ na aham iti grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:124: na hi apahatapāpmatvādi guṇo viparīta guṇatvena śakyate grahītuṃ viparīta guṇo ca apahatapāpmatvādi guṇatvena /
GSP33brssbh4u:125: apahatapāpmatvādi guṇaḥ ca parameśvaraḥ tadviparītaguṇaḥ tu śārīraḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:126: īśvarasya ca saṃsāri ātmatva īśvara abhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:128: saṃsāriṇaḥ api īśvara ātmatve adhikāri abhāvāt śāstra ānarthakyameva,
GSP33brssbh4u:130: anyatve api tādātmya darśanaṃ śāstrāt kartavyaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādidarśanam iti cet kāmamevaṃ bhavatu /
GSP33brssbh4u:131: na tu saṃsāriṇo mukhya ātma īśvara ityetat naḥ prāpayitavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:132: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ātma ityeva parameśvaraḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:133: tathā hi parameśvara prakriyāyāṃ jābālā ātmatvena eva etam upagacchanti - 'tvaṃ vā ahamasmi bhagavo devato 'haṃ vai tvamasi bhagavo deveti' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:134: tathā anye api 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi' ityevam ādaya ātmatva upagamā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:135: grāhayanti ca ātmatvena eva īśvaraṃ vedāntavākyāni 'eṣa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ' (bṛ. 3.4.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:139: yat uktaṃ pratīka darśanam idaṃ viṣṇupratimā nyāyena bhaviṣyati iti tat ayuktaṃ gauṇatva prasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:141: yatra hi pratīkadṛṣṭiḥ abhipreyate sakṛdeva tatra vacanaṃ bhavati yathā - 'mano brahma' (chā. 3.18.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:143: iha punaḥ tvam aham asmi ahaṃ ca tvam asi iti āha,
GSP33brssbh4u:146: tathā hi - 'atha yo 'nyāṃ devatāmupāste 'nyo 'sāvanyo 'hamīti na sa veda' (bṛ. 1.4.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:147: 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.5.7)
GSP33brssbh4u:148: iti evamādyā bhūyasī śrutiḥ bhedadarśanam apavadati /
GSP33brssbh4u:149: yat tu uktaṃ na viruddhaguṇayoḥ anyonya ātmasaṃbhava iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:155: na hi īśvarasya saṃsāri ātmatvaṃ pratipādyata iti abhyupagacchāmaḥ kiṃ tarhi saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsāritva apohena īśvarātmatvaṃ pratipipāyiṣitam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:156: evaṃ ca sati advaita īśvarasya apahatapāpmatvādiguṇatā viparītaguṇatā tu itarasya mithyā iti vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:157: yat api uktam adhikāri abhāvaḥ pratyakṣādivirodhaḥ ca iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:162: ityādinā hi prabodhe pratyakṣādi abhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:163: pratyakṣādi abhāve śruteḥ api abhāvaprasaṅga iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:168: iti vacanāt iṣyata eva asmābhiḥ śruteḥ api abhāvaḥ prabodhe /
GSP33brssbh4u:169: kasya punaḥ ayam aprabodha iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:170: ya- tvaṃ pṛcchasi tasya ta iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:171: nanu aham īśvara eva uktaḥ śrutyā,
GSP33brssbh4u:172: yadi evaṃ pratibuddhaḥ asi na asti kasyacit aprabodhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:173: yaḥ api doṣaḥ codyate kaiścit avidyā kila ātmanaḥ sadvitīyatvāt advaita anupapattiḥ iti saḥ api etena pratyuktaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:174: tasmāt ātma iti eva īśvare mano dadhīta // 3 //
GSP33brssbh4u:177: na pratīke na hi saḥ / BBs_4,1.4 /
GSP33brssbh4u:181: iti evamādiṣu pratīka upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ teṣu api ātmagrahaḥ kartavyo na vā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:185: brahmaṇaḥ śrutiṣu ātmatvena prasiddhatvāt pratīkānām api brahmavikāratvāt brahmatve satyām ātmatva upapatteḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:186: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na pratīkeṣu ātma matiṃ badhnīyāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:187: na hi sa upāsakaḥ pratīkāni vyastāni ātmatvenākalayet /
GSP33brssbh4u:188: yat punaḥ brahmavikāratvāt pratīkānāṃ brahmatvaṃ tataḥ ca ātmatvam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:191: vikārasvarūpa upamardena hi nāmādi jātasya brahmatvameva āśrite bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:192: svarūpa upamarde ca nāmādīnāṃ kutaḥ pratīkatvam ātmagraho vā /
GSP33brssbh4u:193: na ca brahmaṇa ātmatvāt brahmadṛṣṭi upadeśeṣu ātmadṛṣṭiḥ kalpyā /
GSP33brssbh4u:195: kartṛtvādi saṃvarga saṃsāra dharmanirākaraṇe hi brahmaṇa ātmatva upadeśaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:197: ataḥ ca upāsakasya pratīkaiḥ samatvāt ātmagraho na upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:198: na hi rūcaka svastikayoḥ itaretara ātmatvam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:199: suvarṇa ātmatvena iva tu brahma ātmatvena ekatve pratīka abhāvaprasaṅgam avocāma /
GSP33brssbh4u:204: teṣu eva udāharaṇeṣu anyaḥ saṃśayaḥ - kim ādityādi dṛṣṭayo brahmaṇi adhyasitavyāḥ kiṃvā brahmadṛṣṭiḥ ādityādiṣu iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:206: atra hi brahmaśabdasya ādityādiśabdaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam upalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:207: ādityo brahma prāṇo brahma vidyut brahma ityādi samāna vibhakti nirdeśāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:208: na ca atra āñjasaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam avakalpate /
GSP33brssbh4u:210: na hi bhavati gauḥ aśva iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:211: nanu prakṛtivikārabhāvāt brahma ādityānāṃ mṛt śarāvādivat sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:215: paramātma vākyaṃ ca idaṃ tadānīṃ syāt tataḥ ca upāsana adhikāro bādhyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:217: tasmāt brāhmaṇaḥ agniḥ vaiśvānara ityādivat anyatra anyadṛṣṭi adhyāse sati kva kindṛṣṭiḥ adhyasyatām iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:218: tatra aniyamo niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt ityevaṃ prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:219: athavā ādityādi dṛṣṭaya eva brahmaṇi kartavyā iti evaṃ prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:220: evaṃ hi ādityādi dṛṣṭibhiḥ brahma upāsitaṃ bhavati brahma upāsanaṃ ca phalavat iti śāstramaryādā /
GSP33brssbh4u:222: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - brahmadṛṣṭiḥ eva ādityādiṣu syāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:227: tathā ca laukiko nyāyo anugato bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:228: utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭiḥ hi nikṛṣṭe adhyasitavya iti laukiko nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:232: na hi kṣattṛdṛṣṭiparigṛhīto rājā nikarṣaṃ nīyamānaḥ śreyase syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:233: nanu śāstraprāmāṇyāt anāśaṅkanīyaḥ atra pratyavāya prasaṅgo na ca lokikena nyāyena śāstrīyā dṛṣṭiḥ niyantuṃ yukta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:234: atra ucyate - nirdhārite śāstrārtha etat evaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:235: saṃdigdhe tu tasmin nirṇayaṃ prati lokikaḥ api nyāya āśrīyanāṇo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:236: tena ca utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭi adhyāse śāstrārthe avadhāryamāṇe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭim adhyasyan pratyaveyāt iti śliṣyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:237: prāthamyāt ca ādityādi śabdānāṃ mukhyārthatvam avirodhāt gṛhītavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:238: taiḥ svārthavṛttibhiḥ avaruddhāyāṃ buddhau paścāt avatarato brahmaśabdasya mukhyayā vṛttyā sāmānādhikaraṇya asaṃbhavāt brahmadṛṣṭividhānārthata eva avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:239: itiparatvāt api brahmaśabdasya eṣa eva artho nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:240: tathā hi 'brahmetyādeśaḥ' 'brahmetyupāsīta' 'brahametyupāste' iti ca sarvatra itiparaṃ brahmaśabdam uccārayati śuddhān tu ādityādi śabdān /
GSP33brssbh4u:241: tata- ca yathā śuktikāṃ rajatam iti pratyeti ityatra śuktivacana eva śuktikā śabdo rajataśabdaḥ tu rajatapratīti lakṣaṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:242: pratyetyeva hi kevalaṃ rajatam iti na tu tatra rajatam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:243: evam atra api ādityādīn brahma iti pratīyāt iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:244: vākyaśeṣaḥ api ca dvitīyānirdeśena ādityādīneva upāstikriyayā vyāpyamānān darśayati - 'sa ya etamevaṃ vidvānādityaṃ brahmetyupāste' (chā. 3.19.4)
GSP33brssbh4u:247: yat tu uktaṃ brahma upāsanām eva atra ādaraṇīyaṃ phalatvāya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:249: uktena nyāyena ādityādīnām eva upāsyatva avagamāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:250: phalaṃ tu atithyādi upāsana iva ādityādi upāsane 'pi brahma eva dāsyati sarva adhyakṣatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:251: varṇitaṃ ca etat 'phalamata upapatteḥ' (bra.sū. 3.2.38) iti atra /
GSP33brssbh4u:252: īdṛśaṃ ca atra brahmaṇa upāsyatvaṃ yat pratīkeṣu tat dṛṣṭi adhyāropaṇaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādīnām // 5 //
GSP33brssbh4u:260: iti evamādiṣu aṅgāvabaddheṣu upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ kim ādityādiṣu udgīthādi dṛṣṭayo vidhīyante kiṃ vā udgīthādiṣu eva ādityādi dṛṣṭaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:261: tatra aniyamo niyamakāraṇa abhāvāt iti prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:262_0: na hi atra brahmaṇa iva kasyacit utkarṣaviśeṣaḥ avadhāryate 'brahma hi samasta jagat
GSP33brssbh4u:262_1: kāraṇatvāt apahatapāpmatvādi guṇayogāt ca ādityādibhya utkṛṣṭam iti śakyam avadhārayituṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:262_2: na tu āditya udgīthādīnāṃ vikāratva aviśeṣāt kañcit utkarṣaviśeṣa avadhāraṇe kāraṇam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:266: udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmātmakāḥ santaḥ phalahetavo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:269: iti ṛkśabdena pṛthivīṃ nirdiśati sāmaśabdena agniṃ tat ca pṛthivi agnyoḥ rṛk sāmadṛṣṭicīkīrṣāyām avakalpate na ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivi agnidṛṣṭi cikīrṣāyām /
GSP33brssbh4u:270: kṣattari hi rājadṛṣṭikaraṇāt rājaśabda upacaryate na rājani kṣattṛśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:272: iti adhikaraṇanirdeśāt lokeṣu sāma adhyasitavyam iti pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:275: prathamanirdiṣṭeṣu ca ādityādiṣu caramanirdiṣṭaṃ brahma adhyastam 'ādityo brahmetyādeśaḥ' (chā. 3.19.1) ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:276: prathamanirdiṣṭāḥ ca pṛthivyādayaḥ caramanardiṣṭā hiṅkārādayaḥ 'pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ' (chā. 2.2.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:280: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ādityādimataya eva aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran /
GSP33brssbh4u:282: upapadyate hi evam apūrvasaṃnikarṣāt ādityādimatibhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇeṣu udgīthādiṣu karmasamṛddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:283: 'yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:286: svatantraphaleṣu tu katham 'ya etadevaṃ vidvāṃllokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste' (chā. 2.2.3) ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:287: teṣu api adhikṛta adhikārāt prakṛta apūrvasaṃnikarṣeṇa eva phalakalpanā yuktā godohanādīniyamavat /
GSP33brssbh4u:288: phalātmakatvāt ca ādityādīnām udgīthādibhyaḥ karmātmakebhya utkarṣa upapattiḥ ādityādiprāptilakṣaṇaṃ hi karmaphalaṃ śiṣyate śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:291: iti ca udgīthameva upāsyatvena upakramya ādityādimatīḥ vidadhāti /
GSP33brssbh4u:292: yat tu uktam udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmabhūyaṃ bhūtvā phalaṃ kariṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:295: ādityādibhāvena api ca dṛśyamānānām udgīthādīnāṃ karmātmakatvān apāyāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:297: iti tu lākṣaṇika eva pṛthivī agnyoḥ ṛk sāmaśabdaprayogaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:298: lakṣaṇā ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭena viprakṛṣṭena vā svārthasaṃbandhena pravartate /
GSP33brssbh4u:299: tatra yadi api ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivī agnyoḥ ca saṃnidhānayoreva eṣa ṛk sāmaśabdaprayoga ṛk sāmasaṃbandhāt iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:300: kṣattṛśabdaḥapi hi kutaścit kāraṇāt rājānam upasarpan na nivārayituṃ pāryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:302: iti ca yathā akṣaranyāsam ṛca eva pṛthivītvam avadhārayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:303: pṛthivyā hi aktve avadhāryamāṇa iyam ṛk eva ityakṣaranyāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:305: iti ca aṅgāśrayameva vijñānam upasaṃharati na pṛthivyādi āśrayam /
GSP33brssbh4u:307: iti yadi api saptamīnirdiṣṭā lokāḥ tathāpi sāmnyeva te adhyasyeran dvitīyānirdeśena sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:308: sāmani hi lokeṣu adhyasyamāneṣu sāma lokātmana upāsitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:309: anyathā punaḥ lokāḥ sāmā ātmana upāsitāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:312: yatra api tulyo dvitīyanirdeśaḥ - 'atha khalvamumādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.9.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:313: iti, tatra api 'samastasya khalu sāmna upāsanaṃ sādhu' (chā. 2.8.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:316: iti ca sāmna eva upāsyatva upakramāt tasmin eva ādityādi adhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:317: etasmāt eva ca sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt 'pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ' (chā. 2.2.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:318: ityādinirdeśaviparyaye api hiṅkārādiṣu eva pṛthivyādi dṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:319: tasmāt anaṅgāśrayā ādityādimatayaḥ aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran iti siddham // 6 //
GSP33brssbh4u:323: karmāṅgasaṃbaddheṣu tāvat upāsaneṣu karmatantratvāt na āsanādicintā na api samyak darśane vastutantratvāt vijñānasya /
GSP33brssbh4u:324: itareṣu tu upāsaneṣu kim aniyamena tiṣṭhan āsīnaḥ śayāno vā pravarteta uta niyamena āsīna eva iti cintayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:325: tatra mānasatvāt upāsanasya aniyamaḥ śarīrasthiteḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:326: evaṃ prāpte bravīti - āsīna eva upāsīta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:328: upāsanaṃ nāma samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇaṃ na ca tat gacchato dhāvato vā saṃbhavati gatyādīnāṃ cittavikṣepakatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:329: tiṣṭhataḥ api dehadhāraṇe vyāpṛtaṃ mano na sūkṣmavastunirīkṣaṇakṣamaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:330: śayānasya api akasmāt eva nidrayā abhibhūyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:331: āsīnasya tu evañjātīyako bhūyān doṣaḥ suparihara iti saṃbhavati tasya upāsanam // 7 //
GSP33brssbh4u:334: api ca dhyāyati arthaṃ eṣa yat samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇam /
GSP33brssbh4u:335: dhyāyatiḥ ca praśithila aṅgaceṣṭeṣu pratiṣṭhitadṛṣṭiṣu ekaviṣaya ākṣiptacitteṣu upacaryamāṇo dṛśyate dhyāyati bako dhyāyati proṣitabandhuḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:341: iti atra pṛthivyādiṣu acalatvameva apekṣya dhyāyativādo bhavati tat ca liṅgam upāsanasya āsīnakarmatve // 9 //
GSP33brssbh4u:344: smaranti api ca śiṣṭā upāsana aṅgatvena āsanam - 'śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiramāsanamātmanaḥ' (gī. 6.11) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh4u:345: ata eva padmakādīnām āsanaviśeṣāṇām upadeśo yogaśāstre // 10 //
GSP33brssbh4u:349: dik deśakāleṣu saṃśayaḥ - kim asti kaścit niyamo na asti vā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:350: prāyeṇa vaidikeṣu ārambheṣu digādiniyamadarśanāt syāt iha api kaścit niyama iti yasya matiḥ taṃ prati āha dik deśakāleṣu arthalakṣaṇa eva niyamaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:351: yatra eva asya diśi deśe kāle vā manasaḥ sokaryeṇa ekāgratā bhavati tatra eva upāsīta prācīdik pūrvāhna prācīna pravaṇādivat viśeṣa aśrāvaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:353: nanu viśeṣam api kecit āmananti - 'same śucau kharkarāvahnivālukāvivarjite śabdajalāśrayādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:357: sati tu etasmin tadgateṣu viśeṣaniyama iti suhṛt bhūtvā ācārya ācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh4u:358: 'manonukūle' iti ca eṣā śrutiḥ yatra ekāgratā tatra eva iti etat eva darśayati // 11 //
GSP33brssbh4u:361: ā prayāṇāt tatrāpi hi dṛṣṭam / BBs_4,1.12 /
GSP33brssbh4u:362: āvṛttiḥ sarva upāsaneṣu ādartavya iti sthitam ādye adhikaraṇe /
GSP33brssbh4u:363: tatra yāni tāvat samyak darśanārthāni upāsanāni tāni avaghātādivat kāryaparyavasānāni iti jñātameva eṣām āvṛttiparimāṇam /
GSP33brssbh4u:364: na hi samyak darśane kārye niṣpanne yatnāntaraṃ kiñcit śāsituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:366: yāni punaḥ abhyudayaphalāni teṣu eṣā cintā kiṃ kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam āvartya uparamet uta yāvajjīvam āvartayet iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:368: kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam abhyasya utsṛjet āvṛttiviśiṣṭasya upāsanaśabdārthasya kṛtatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:369: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - āprāyaṇāt eva āvartayet pratyayam /
GSP33brssbh4u:371: karmāṇi api hi janmāntara upabhogyaṃ phalam ārabhamāṇāni tat anurūpaṃ bhāvanāvijñānaṃ prāyaṇakāla ākṣipanti,
GSP33brssbh4u:373: prāṇastejasā yuktaḥ sahātmanā yathāsaṃkalpitaṃ lokaṃ nayati' iti ca evamādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:375: pratyayāḥ tu ete svarūpa anuvṛttiṃ muktvā kim anyat prāyaṇakālabhāvi bhāvanāvijñānam apekṣeran /
GSP33brssbh4u:376: tasmāt ye pratipattavyaphalabhāvanātmakāḥ pratyayaḥ teṣu aprāyaṇāt āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:377: tathā ca śrutiḥ -'sa yāvatkraturayamasmāllokātpraiti' iti prāyaṇakāle api pratyaya anuvṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:378: smṛtiḥ api - 'yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
GSP33brssbh4u:381: 'so 'ntavelāyāmetattrayaṃ pratipadyeta' iti ca maraṇavelāyām api kartavyaśeṣaṃ śrāvayati // 12 //
GSP33brssbh4u:386: atha idānīṃ brahmavidyāphalaṃ prati cintā pratāyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:387: brahma adhigame sati tat viparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ kṣīyate na kṣīyate vā iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:389: phalārthatvāt karmaṇaḥ phalam adatvā na saṃbhāvyate kṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:390: phaladāyinī hi asya śaktiḥ śrutyā samadhigatā /
GSP33brssbh4u:391: yadi tadantareṇa eva phala upabhogam apavṛjyeta śrutiḥ kadarthitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:393: nanu evaṃ sati prāyaścitta upadeśaḥanarthakaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh4u:396: api ca prāyaścittānāṃ doṣasaṃyogena vidānāt bhavet api doṣakṣapaṇārthatā na tu evaṃ brahmavidyāyāṃ vidhānam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:397: nanu anabhyupagamyamāne brahmavidaḥ karmakṣaye tatphalasya avaśyaṃ bhoktavyatāvāt anirmokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:400: tasmāt na brahma adhigame duritanivṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:401: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- tat adhigame brahma adhigame sati uttarapūrvayoḥ aghayoḥ aśleṣavināśau bhavataḥ uttarasya aśleṣaḥ pūrvasya vināśaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:404_0: tathā hi brahmavidyā prakriyāyāṃ saṃbhāvyamānasaṃbandhasya āgāmino duritasya anabhisaṃbandhaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:404_1: viduṣo vyapadiśati - 'yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma
GSP33brssbh4u:405: tathā vināśam api pūrva ucitasya duritasya vyapadiśati - 'tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante' (chā. 5.24.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:406: ayam aparaḥ karmakṣayavyapadeśo bhavati - 'bhidyate hṛdayagranthiśchidyante sarvasaṃśayāḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:407: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (mu. 2.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:408: yat uktam anupabhuktaphalasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayakalpanāyāṃ śāstraṃ kadarthitaṃ syāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:410: na hi vayaṃ karmaṇaḥ phaladāyinīṃ śaktim avajānīmahe,
GSP33brssbh4u:412: sā tu vidyādinā kāraṇāntareṇa pratibadhyata iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:413: śaktisadbhāvamātre ca śāstraṃ vyāpriyate na pratibandha apratibandhayoḥ api /
GSP33brssbh4u:414: na hi karma kṣīyata iti etat api smaraṇam autsargikaṃ na bhogāt ṛte karma kṣīyata tadarthatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:415: iṣyata eva tu prāyaścittādinā tasya kṣayaḥ 'sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tarati' 'tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvamedhena yajate ya u cainameva vada' ityādi śrutismṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:416: yat tu uktaṃ naimittikāni prāyaścittāni bhaviṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:418: doṣasaṃyogena codyamānānām eṣāṃ doṣanirghātaphalasaṃbhave phalāntarakalpanā anupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:419: yatpunaḥ etat uktaṃ na prāyaścittavat doṣakṣaya uddeśena vidyāvidānam asti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:420: atra brūmaḥ - saguṇāsu tāvat vidyāsu vidyata eva vidhānam /
GSP33brssbh4u:421: tāsu ca vākyaśeṣa aiśvaryaprāptiḥ pāpanivṛttiḥ ca vidyāvata ucyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:422: tayoḥ ca avivakṣākāraṇaṃ na asti iti ataḥ pāpmaprahāṇapūrvaka aiśvaryaprāptiḥ tāsāṃ phalam iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:423: nirguṇāyāṃ tu vidyāyāṃ yadi api vidhānaṃ na asti tathā api akartṛ ātmatvabodhāt karmapradāhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:424: aśleṣa iti ca āgāmiṣu karmasu kartṛtvameva na pratipadyate brahmavit iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:425: atikrānteṣu tu yadi api mithyājñānāt kartṛtvaṃ pratipeda iva tathā api vidyāsāmarthyāt mithyājñānanivṛtteḥ tāni api pravilīyanta iti āha vināśa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:426_0: pūrvasiddhakartṛtva bhoktṛtva viparītaṃ hi triṣu api kāleṣu akartṛtva abhoktṛtvasvarūpaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:426_1: brahma aham asmi na itaḥ pūrvam api kartā bhoktā vā aham āsaṃ na idānīṃ na api bhaviṣyatkāla
GSP33brssbh4u:428: anyathā hi anādikālapravṛttānāṃ karmāṇāṃ kṣayābhāve mokṣa abhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:429: na ca deśakālanimittāpekṣo mokṣaḥ karmaphalavat bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:432: tasmāt brahma adhigame duritakṣaya iti sthiram // 13 //
GSP33brssbh4u:435: itarasyāpy evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu / BBs_4,1.14 /
GSP33brssbh4u:436: pūrvasmin adhikaraṇe bandhahetoḥ aghasya svābhāvikasya aśleṣavināśau jñānanimittau śāstravyapadeśāt nirūpitau /
GSP33brssbh4u:437: dharmasya punaḥ śāstrīyatvāt śāstrīyeṇa jñānena avirodha iti āśaṅkya tat nirākaraṇāya pūrva adhikaraṇanyāya atideśaḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:438: itarasya api puṇyasya karmaṇa evam aghavat asaṃśleṣo vināśaḥ ca jñānavato bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:441: ityādiśrutiṣu ca duṣkṛtavat sukṛtasya api praṇāśavyapadeśāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:442: akartṛ ātmatvabodhanimittasya ca karmakṣayasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ tulyatvāt 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi' (mu. 2.2.8)
GSP33brssbh4u:444: yatra api kevala eva pāpmaśabdo dṛśyate tatra api tena eva puṇyam api akalitam iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:446: asti ca śrutau puṇye api pāpmaśabdaḥ 'nainaṃ setumahorātre tarataḥ' (chā. 8.4.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:447: iti atra saha duṣkṛtena sakṛtamapi anukramya sarve pāpmānaḥ ato nivartanta iti aviśeṣeṇa eva prakṛte puṇye pāpmaśabdaprayogāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:448: pāte tu iti tu śabdaḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:449: evaṃ dharma adharmayoḥ bandhahetvoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt aśleṣavināśasiddheḥ avaśyaṃbhāvinī viduṣaḥ śarīrapāte muktiḥ iti avadhārayati // 14//
GSP33brssbh4u:452: anārabdhakārye eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ / BBs_4,1.15 /
GSP33brssbh4u:453_0: pūrvayoḥ adhikaraṇayoḥ jñānanimittaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vināśaḥ avadhāritaḥ sa kim
GSP33brssbh4u:453_1: aviśeṣeṇa ārabdhakāryayoḥ anārabdhakāryayoḥ ca bhavati uta viśeṣeṇa anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva iti vicāryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:455: iti evamādiśrutiṣu aviśeṣaśravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva kṣaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:456: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - anārabdhakārye eva tu iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:457_0: apravṛttaphale eva pūrve janmāntarasaṃcite asmin api ca janmani prāk jñāna utpatteḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:457_1: saṃcite sukṛtaduṣkṛte jñāna adhigamāt kṣīyete na tu ārabdhakārye sāmibhuktaphale
GSP33brssbh4u:457_2: yābhyām etat brahmajñāna āyatanaṃ janma nirmitam /
GSP33brssbh4u:458: kuta etat - 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā. 6.14.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:460: itarathā hi jñānāt aśeṣakarmakṣaye sati sthitihetu abhāvāt jñānaprāpti anantarameva kṣemamśnu avīta,
GSP33brssbh4u:462: nanu vastubalena eva ayam akartṛ ātmāvabodhaḥ karmāṇi kṣapayan kathaṃ kānicit kṣapayet kānicit ca upekṣeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:463: na hi samāne agnibījasaṃparke keṣāñcit bījaśaktiḥ kṣīyate keṣāñcit na kṣīyata iti śakyam aṅgīkartum iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:464: ucyate - na tāvat anāśritya ārabdhakāryaṃ karmāśayaṃ jñāna utpattiḥ upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:465: āśrite ca tasmin kulālacakravat pravṛttavegasya antarāle pratibandha asaṃbhavāt bhavati vegakṣayapratipālanam /
GSP33brssbh4u:466: akartṛ ātmabodhaḥ api hi mithyājñānabādhanena karmāṇi ucchinatti /
GSP33brssbh4u:467: bādhitam api tu mithyājñānaṃ dvicandrajñānavat saṃskāravaśāt kañcitkālam anuvartata eva /
GSP33brssbh4u:468: api ca na eva atra vivaditavyaṃ brahmavidā kañcitkālaṃ śarīraṃ dhriyate na vā dhriyata iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:469: kathaṃ hi ekasya svahṛdayapratyayaṃ brahmavedanaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca apareṇa pratikṣeptuṃ śakyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:471: tasmāt anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt kṣaya iti nirṇayaḥ // 15 //
GSP33brssbh4u:475: puṇyasya api aśleṣavināśayoḥ aghanyāyaḥ atidiṣṭaḥ saḥ atideśaḥ sarvapuṇyaviṣaya iti āśaṅkya prativakti - agnihotrādi tu iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:477: yat nityaṃ karma vaidikam agnihotrādi tat tat kāryāya eva bhavati,
GSP33brssbh4u:478: jñānasya yatkāryaṃ tadeva asya api kāryam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:479: kutaḥ - 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssbh4u:481: nanu jñānakarmaṇoḥ vilakṣaṇakāryatvāt kārya ekatva anupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:484: tadvat karmaṇaḥ api jñānasaṃyuktasya mokṣakārya upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:485: nanu anārabhyo mokṣaḥ katham asya karmakāryatvam ucyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:488: jñānasya eva hi prāpakaṃ satkarma prāṇāḍyā mokṣakāraṇam iti upacaryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:489: ata eva ca atikrāntaviṣayam etat kārya ekatva abhidhānam /
GSP33brssbh4u:490: na hi brahmavida āgāmi agnihotrādi saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:492: saguṇāsu tu vidyāsu kartṛtva anativṛtteḥ saṃbhavati āgāmi api agnihotrādi /
GSP33brssbh4u:493: tasya api nirabhisaṃdhinaḥ kāryāntara abhāvāt vidyāsaṃgati upapattiḥ // 16 //
GSP33brssbh4u:495: kiṃviṣayaṃ punaḥ idam aśleṣavināśa vacanaṃ kiṃviṣayaṃ vā ado viniyogavacanam ekeṣāṃ śākhinām 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:498: ataḥ agnihotrādeḥ nityātkarmaṇaḥ anyāpi hi asti sādhukṛtyā yā phalam abhisaṃdhāya kriyate tasyā eṣa viniyoga ukta ekeṣāṃ śākhinām 'suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāmupayanti' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:499: tasyā eva ca idam aghavat aśleṣavināśanirūpaṇam itarasya api evam aśleṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:500: tathā jātīyakasya kāmyasya karmaṇo vidyāṃ prati anupakārakatve saṃpratipattiḥ ubhayoḥ api jaiminibādarāyaṇayoḥ ācāryayoḥ // 17 //
GSP33brssbh4u:504_0: samadhigatam etat anantara adhikaraṇe nityam agnihotrādikaṃ karma mumukṣuṇā mokṣaprayojana
GSP33brssbh4u:504_2: mokṣaprayojanabrahma adhigamanimittatvena brahmavidyayā saha ekakāryaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:505: tatra agnihotrādi karmāṅgavyapāśrayavidyāsaṃyuktaṃ kevalaṃ ca asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:506: 'ya evaṃ vidvānayajati' 'ya evaṃ vidvāñjuhoti' 'ya evaṃ vidvāñchaṃsati' 'ya evaṃ vidvāngāyati' 'tasmādevaṃvidameva brahmāṇaṃ kurviti nānevaṃ vidaṃ' (chā. 4.17.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:507: 'tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda' (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:508: ityādivacanebhyo vidyāsaṃyuktam asti kevalam api asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:509_0: tatra idaṃ vicāryate - kiṃ vidyāsaṃyuktameva agnihotrādikaṃ karma mumukṣoḥ vidyāhetutvena
GSP33brssbh4u:509_1: tayā saha ekakāryatvaṃ pratipadyate na kevalam uta vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ kevalaṃ ca aviśeṣeṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:510: kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ - 'tametamātmānaṃ yajñena vividiṣanti' iti yajñādīnāmvi aśeṣeṇa ātmavedanāṅgatvena śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:512: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ vidyāsaṃyuktam eva karmāgnihotrādi ātmavidyāśeṣatvaṃ pratipadyate na vidyāhīnam /
GSP33brssbh4u:518: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate - yadeva vidyayā iti hi /
GSP33brssbh4u:520: vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ karmāgnihotrādikaṃ vidyāvihīnāt karmaṇaḥ agnihotrāt viśiṣṭaṃ vidvāniva brāhmaṇo vidyāvihīnāt brāhmaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:521: tathā api na atyantam anapekṣaṃ vidyāvihīnaṃ karmāgnihotrādikam /
GSP33brssbh4u:522: kasmāt - 'tametamātmānaṃ yajñena vividiṣanti' iti aviśeṣeṇa agnihotrādeḥ vidyāhetutvena śrutatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:523: nanu vidyāsaṃyuktasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyāvihīnāt viśiṣṭatva avagamāt vidyāvihīnam agnihotrādi ātmavidyāhetutvena anapekṣameva iti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:525: vidyāsahāyasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyānimittena sāmarthya atiśayena yogāt ātmajñānaṃ prati kaścit kāraṇa atiśayo bhaviṣyati na tathā vidyāvihīnasya iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssbh4u:526: natu 'yajñena vividiṣanti' iti atra aviśeṣeṇa ātmajñānāṅgatvena śrutasya agnihotrādeḥ anaṅgatvaṃ śakyam abhyupagantum /
GSP33brssbh4u:527: tathā hi śrutiḥ - 'yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssbh4u:528_0: iti vidyāsaṃyuktasya karmaṇaḥ agnihotrādeḥ vīryavattaratva abhidhānena svakāryaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:528_1: prati kañcit atiśayaṃ bruvāṇā vidyāvihīnasya tasya eva tat prayojanaṃ prati vīryavattvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:529: karmaṇa- ca vīryavattvaṃ tat yat svaprayojanasādhanaprasahatvam /
GSP33brssbh4u:530_0: tasmāt vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ nityam agnihotrādi vidyāvihīnaṃ ca ubhayam api mumukṣuṇā mokṣaprayojana
GSP33brssbh4u:530_1: uddeśena iha janmani janmāntare ca prāk jñāna utpatteḥ kṛtaṃ yat tat yathāsāmarthyaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:530_3: pratipadyamānaṃ śravaṇa manana śraddhā tātparyādi antaraṅgakāraṇāpekṣaṃ brahmavidyayā
GSP33brssbh4u:533: bhogena tv itare kṣapayitvātha saṃpadyate / BBs_4,1.19 /
GSP33brssbh4u:534_0: anārabdhakāryayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt kṣaya uktaḥ itare tu ārabdhakārye
GSP33brssbh4u:534_1: puṇyapāpe upabhogena kṣapayitvā brahma saṃpadyate 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye
GSP33brssbh4u:536: nanu sati api samyak darśane yathā prāk dehapātāt bhedadarśanaṃ dvicandradarśananyāyena anuvṛttamevaṃ paścāt api anuvarteta /
GSP33brssbh4u:539: upabhogaśeṣakṣapaṇaṃ hi tatra anuvṛttinimittaṃ na ca tādṛśamātra kiñcit asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:540: nanu aparaḥ karmāśayoḥ abhinavam upabhogm ārapsyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:543_0: mithyājñāna avaṣṭambhaṃ hi karmāntaraṃ dehapāta upabhogāntaram ārabhate tat ca mithyājñāna
GSP33brssbh4u:543_1: avaṣṭambhaṃ hi karmāntaraṃ dehapāta upabhogāntaram ārabhate tatca mithyājñānaṃ samyak
GSP33brssbh4u:543_2: jñānena dagdham ityataḥ sādhu etat ārabdhakāryakṣaye viduṣaḥ kaivalyam avaśyaṃ bhavati iti // 19 //
GSP33brssbh4u:550: atha aparāsu vidyāsu phalaprāptaye devayānaṃ panthānam avatārayiṣyan prathamaṃ tāvat yathāśāstram utkrāntikramam anvācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh4u:551: samānā hi vidvat aviduṣoḥ utkrāntiḥ iti vakṣyati /
GSP33brssbh4u:552: asti prāyaṇaviṣayā śrutiḥ 'asya somya puruṣasya prayato vāk manasi saṃpadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇa- tejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām' (chā. 6.8.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:553: kim iha vāca eva vṛttimattyā manasi saṃpattiḥ ucyata uta vāgvṛtteḥiti viśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:554: tatra vāk eva tāvat manasi saṃpadyata iti prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:557: śrutilakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā /
GSP33brssbh4u:558: tasmāt vāca eva ayaṃ manasi pralaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:559: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vāk vṛttiḥ iti vyākhyāte yāvatā vāk menasi iti eva ācāryaḥ paṭhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:561: paṭhiṣyati tu purastāt 'avibhāgo vacanāt' (bra. sū. 4.2.16) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:562: tasmāt atra vṛtti upaśamamātraṃ vivakṣitam iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:563: tattvapralayavivakṣāyāṃ tu sarvatra eva avibhāgasāmyāt kiṃ paratra eva viśiṣyāt avibhāga iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:565: vāk vṛttiḥ pūrvam upasaṃhriyate manovṛttau avasthitāyām iti arthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:568: dṛśyate hi vāk vṛtteḥ pūrva upasaṃhāro manovṛttau vidyamānāyām /
GSP33brssbh4u:569: nanu śrutisāmarthyāt vāca eva ayaṃ manasi apyayo yukta iti uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:572: yasya hi yata utpattiḥ tasya tatra pralayo nyāyyo mṛdīva śarāvasya /
GSP33brssbh4u:573: na ca manaso vāk utpadyata iti kiñcana pramāṇam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:574: vṛttyutti udbhava abhibhavau tu aprakṛtisamāśrayau api dṛśyete /
GSP33brssbh4u:575: pārthivebhyo hi indhanebhyaḥ taijasasya agneḥ vṛttiḥ udbhavati apsu ca upaśāmyati /
GSP33brssbh4u:576: kathaṃ tarhi asmin pakṣe śabdo vāk manasi saṃpadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:578: śabdaḥ api asmin pakṣe avakalpate vṛttivṛttimatoḥ abheda upacārāt iti arthaḥ // 1 //
GSP33brssbh4u:585: iti atra aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām eva indriyāṇāṃ manasi saṃpattiḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:586_0: tatra api ata eva vāca iva cakṣurādīnām api savṛttike manasi avasthite vṛttilopadarśanāt
GSP33brssbh4u:586_1: tattvapralaya asaṃbhavāt śabda upapatteḥ ca vṛttidvāreṇa eva sarvāṇi indriyāṇi manaḥ anuvartante /
GSP33brssbh4u:587: sarveṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ manasi upasaṃhāra aviśeṣe sati vācaḥ pṛthak grahaṇaṃ vāk manasi saṃpadyata iti udāharaṇa anurodhena // 2 //
GSP33brssbh4u:594: iti kim atra api vṛttisaṃpattiḥ eva vivakṣyata uta vṛttimat saṃpattiḥ iti vicikitsāyāṃ vṛttimat saṃpattiḥ eva atra iti prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:595: śruti anugrahāt tat prakṛtikatva upapatteḥ ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:596: tathā hi - 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥprāṇaḥ' (chā. 6.5.4)
GSP33brssbh4u:597: iti annayoni mana ātmananti ap yoniṃ ca prāṇam /
GSP33brssbh4u:599: ata- ca yat manaḥ prāṇe prakṛtivikāra abhedāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:600: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tat api agṛhīta bāhya indriyavṛtti mano vṛttidvāreṇa eva prāṇe pralīyate iti uttarāt vākyāt avagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:601: tathā hi suṣupso- mumūrṣoḥ ca prāṇavṛttau parispanda ātmikāyām avasthitāyāṃ manovṛttīnām upaśamo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:602: na ca manasaḥ svarūpa apyayaḥ prāṇe saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:606: na hi īdṛśena prāṇāḍikena tat prakṛtitvena manaḥ prāṇe saṃpattum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:607: evam api hi anne manaḥ saṃpadyeta apsu ca annam apsu eva ca prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:608: na hi etasmin api pakṣe prāṇabhāvapariṇatābhyaḥ adbhyo mano jāyata iti kiñcana pramāṇam asti tasmāt na manasaḥ prāṇe svarūpa apyayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:609: vṛtti apyaye api tu śabdaḥ avakalpate vṛttivattimatoḥ abheda upacārāt iti darśitam // 3 //
GSP33brssbh4u:613: sthitam etat yasya yato na utpattiḥ tasya tasmin vṛttipralayo na svarūpapralaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:614: idam idānīṃ prāṇaḥ tejasi iti atra cintyate -
GSP33brssbh4u:615: kiṃ yathāśruti prāṇasya tejasi eva vṛtti upasaṃhāraḥ kiṃvā deha indriyapañjara adhyakṣe jīva iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:616: tatra śruteḥ anatiśaṅkyatvāt prāṇasya tejasi eva saṃpattiḥ syāt aśrutakalpanāyā anyāyyatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:617: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate saḥ adhyakṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:618: sa prakṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ adhyakṣe avidyākarmapūrvaprajña upādhike vijñāna ātmani avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:619: tat pradhānā prāṇavṛttiḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:621: evam eva imam ātmānam antakāle sarve prāṇā abhisāmayanti yatra etat ūrdhva ucchvāsī bhavati iti hi śrutyantaram adhyakṣa upagāminaḥ sarvān prāṇān aviśeṣeṇa darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:623: iti pañcavṛtteḥ prāṇasya adhyakṣa anugāmitāṃ darśayati tat anuvṛttitāṃ ca itareṣām /
GSP33brssbh4u:625: 'savijñāno bhavati' iti ca adhyakṣasya antarvijñānavattva pradarśanena tasmin apītakaraṇagrāmasya prāṇasya avasthānaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:626: nanu prāṇaḥ tejasi iti śrūyate kathaṃ prāṇaḥ adhyakṣa iti adhikāvāpaḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:628: adhyakṣapradhānatvāt utkramaṇādivyavahārasya śrutyantaragatasya api ca viśeṣasya apekṣaṇīyatvāt // 4 //
GSP33brssbh4u:630: kathaṃ tarhi prāṇaḥ tejasi iti śrutiḥ iti ata āha -
GSP33brssbh4u:632: sa prāṇasaṃpṛktaḥ adhyakṣaḥ tejaḥsahacariteṣu bhūteṣu dehabījabhūteṣu sūkṣmeṣu avatiṣṭhata iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:634: nanu ca iyaṃ śrutiḥ prāṇasya tejasi sthitiṃ darśayati na prāṇasaṃpṛktasya adhyakṣasya /
GSP33brssbh4u:636: saḥ adhyakṣa iti adhyakṣasya api antarāle api upasaṃkhyātatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:637: yaḥ api hi srughnānmathurāṃ gatvā mathurāyāḥ pāṭaliputraṃ vrajati saḥ api srughnātpāṭaliputraṃ yāti iti śakyate vaditum /
GSP33brssbh4u:638: tasmāt prāṇaḥ tejasi iti prāṇasaṃpṛktasya adhyakṣasya eva etat tejaḥ sahacariteṣu bhūteṣu avasthānam // 5 //
GSP33brssbh4u:639: kathaṃ tejaḥsahacariteṣu bhūteṣu iti ucyate yāvat ekameva śrūyate prāṇaḥ tejasi iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:643: na ekasmin eva tejasi śarīrāntaraprepsāvelāyāṃ jīvaḥ avatiṣṭhate kāryasya śarīrasya anekātmakatvadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:644: darśayataḥ ca etam arthaṃ praśnaprativacane 'āpaḥ puruṣavacasaḥ' (chā. 5.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:648: smṛtiḥ api 'aṇvyo mātrāvināśinyo daśārdhānāṃ tu yāḥsmṛtāḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:650: nanu ca upasaṃhṛteṣu vāk ādiṣu karaṇeṣu śarīrāntaraprepsāvelāyāṃ 'kvāyaṃ tadā puruṣo bhavati' (bṛ. 3.2.13)
GSP33brssbh4u:651: iti upakramya śrutyantaraṃ karmāśrayatāṃ nirūpayati - 'tau ha yadūcatuḥ karma haiva tadūcaturatha ha yatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ karma haiva tatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.13) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:652: atra ucyate - tatra karmaprayuktasya graha atigrahasaṃjñakastha indriyaviṣayātmakasya bandhanasya pravṛttiḥ iti karmāśrayatā uktā /
GSP33brssbh4u:653: iha punaḥ bhūta upādānāt dehāntara utpattiḥ iti bhūtāśrayatvam uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:654: praśaṃsāśabdāt api tatra prādhānyamātraṃ karmaṇaḥ pradarśitaṃ na tu āśrayāntaraṃ nivāritam /
GSP33brssbh4u:663: sā iyam utkrāntiḥ kiṃ vidvat aviduṣoḥ samānā kiṃvā viśeṣavati iti viśayānānāṃ viśeṣavati iti tāvat prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:669: nanu vidyāprakaraṇe samāmnānāt viduṣa eva eṣā bhavet /
GSP33brssbh4u:672: tathā hi 'yatraitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti nāma' 'aśiśiṣati nāma' 'pipāsati nāma' (chā. 6.8.3,5)
GSP33brssbh4u:673: iti ca sarvaprāṇisādhāraṇā eva svāpādayaḥ anukīrtyante vidyāprakaraṇe api pratipādayiṣitavastupratipādana anuguṇyena na tu viduṣo viśeṣavanto vidhitsyante /
GSP33brssbh4u:674: evam iyam api utkrāntiḥ mahājanagata eva anukīrtyate yasyāṃ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ puruṣasya prayataḥ tejaḥ saṃpadyate sa ātmā tattvamasi iti etat pratipādayitum /
GSP33brssbh4u:675: pratiṣiddhā ca eṣā viduṣaḥ 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:677: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - samānā ca eṣa utkrāntiḥ vāk manasi ityādyā vidvat aviduṣoḥ āsṛti upakramāt bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:679: aviruddhān dehabījabhūtāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi āśritya karmaprayukto dehagrahaṇam anubhavituṃ saṃsarati /
GSP33brssbh4u:681: tat etat āsṛti upakramāt iti uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:682: nanu amṛtatvaṃ hi viduṣā prāptavyaṃ na ca tat deśāntara āyattaṃ tatra kṛto bhūta āśrayatvaṃ sṛti upakramo vā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:684: adagdhvā atyantam avidyādīn kleśān aparavidyāsāmarthyāt āpekṣikam amṛtatvaṃ prepsate saṃbhavati tatra sṛti upakramo bhūta āśrayatvaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:685: ne hi nirāśrayāṇāṃ prāṇānāṃ gatiḥ upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:691: iti atra prakaraṇasāmarthyāt tat yathāprakṛtaṃ tejaḥ sādhyakṣaṃ saprāṇaṃ sakaraṇagrāmaṃ bhūtāntarasahitaṃ prayataḥ puṃsaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ saṃpadyata iti etat uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:692: kīdṛśī punaḥ iyaṃ saṃpattiḥ syāt iti cintyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:693: tatra ātyantika eva tāvat svarūpapravilaya iti prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:695: sarvasya hi janimato vastujātasya prakṛtiḥ parā devatā iti pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssbh4u:697: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tat teja ādi bhūtasūkṣmaṃ śrotrādikaraṇāśrayabhūtamāpīterā saṃsāramokṣāt samyak jñānanimittāt avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:701: anyathā hi sarvaḥ prāyaṇasamaya eva upādhipratyastamayāt atyantaṃ brahma saṃpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:702: tatra vidhiśāstram anarthakaṃ syāt vidyāśāstraṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:703: mithyājñānanimittaḥ ca bandho na samyak jñānāt ṛte visraṃsitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:704: tasmāt tat prakṛtitve api suṣuptapralayavat bījabhāva avaśeṣa eva eṣā saṃtsapattiḥ iti // 8 //
GSP33brssbh4u:707: tat ca itarabhūtasahitaṃ tejo jīvasya asmāt śarīrāt pravasata āśrayabhūtaṃ svarūpataḥ pramāṇataḥ ca sūkṣmaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:708: tathā hi - nāḍīniṣkramaṇaśravaṇādibhyaḥ asya saukṣmyam upalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:711: ata eva ca dehāt nirgacchan pārśvasthaiḥ na upalabhyate // 9 //
GSP33brssbh4u:714: ata eva sūkṣmatvāt na asya sthūlasya śarīrasya upamardena dāhādinimittena itarat sūkṣmaṃ śarīram upapadyate // 10 //
GSP33brssbh4u:717: asya eva ca sūkṣmasyā śarīrasya eṣa ūṣmā yam etasmin śarīre saṃsparśena ūṣmāṇaṃ vijānanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:718_0: tathā hi mṛtāvasthāyām avasthite api dehe vidyamāneṣu api ca rūpādiṣu dehaguṇeṣu
GSP33brssbh4u:718_1: na ūṣma upalabhyate jīvat avasthāyām eva tu upalabhyata iti ata dehaguṇeṣu na ūṣma
GSP33brssbh4u:718_2: upalabhyate jīvat avasthāyām eva tu upalabhyata iti ata upapadyate prasiddhaśarīravyatiriktavyapāśraya eva eṣa ūṣma iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:719: tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'uṣṇa eva jīviṣyañśito mariṣyan iti' // 11 //
GSP33brssbh4u:722: pratiṣedhād iti cen na śārīrāt / BBs_4,2.12 /
GSP33brssbh4u:723: 'amṛtatvaṃ cānupoṣya' iti ato viśeṣaṇāt ātyantike amṛtatve gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvo abhyupagataḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:724_0: tatra api kenacit kāraṇena utkrāntim āśaṅkya pratiṣedhati - 'athākāmayamāno yo 'kāmo
GSP33brssbh4u:724_1: niṣkāma āptakāma ātmakāmo bhavati na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti brahmaiva sanbrahmāpyeti' (bṛ. 4.4.6)
GSP33brssbh4u:725: iti ataḥ paravidyāviṣayāt pratiṣedhāt na parabrahmavido dehāt prāṇānām utkrāntiḥ asti iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:727: yataḥ śārīrāt ātmana eṣa utkrāntipratiṣedhaḥ prāṇānāṃ na śarīrāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:728: katham avagamyate 'na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmanti' iti śākhāntare pañcamī prayogāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:729: saṃbandhasāmānyaviṣayā hi ṣaṣṭhī śākhāntaragatayā pañcamyā saṃbandhaviśeṣe vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:730: tasmāt iti ca prādhānyāt abhyudayaniḥśreyasa adhikṛto dehī saṃbadhyate na dehaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:732: tasmāt uccikramiṣoḥ jīvāt prāṇā apakrāmanti saha eva tena bhavanti iti arthaḥ // 12 //
GSP33brssbh4u:734: saprāṇasya ca pravasato bhavati utkrāntiḥ dehāt iti evaṃ prāpte prati ucyate -
GSP33brssbh4u:736: na tat asti yat uktaṃ parabrahmavidaḥ api dehāt asti utkrāntiḥ utkrāntipratiṣedhasya deha upādānatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:737: yato deha upādāna eva utkrāntipratiṣedha ekeṣāṃ samāmnātṛṇāṃ spaṣṭa upalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:738: tathā hi - ārtabhāgapraśne 'yatrāyaṃ puruṣo mriyata udasmātprāṇāḥ krāmantyāho neti' (bṛ. 3.2.11)
GSP33brssbh4u:740_0: iti anutkrāntipakṣaṃ parigṛhya na tarhi ayam anutkrānteṣu prāṇeṣu mriyata iti asyām
GSP33brssbh4u:740_1: āśaṅkāyām 'atraiva samavanīyanta' iti pravilayaṃ prāṇānāṃ pratijñāya tat siddhaye
GSP33brssbh4u:741: iti saśabdaparāmṛṣṭasya prakṛtasya utkrānti avadheḥ ucchvayanādīni samāmananti /
GSP33brssbh4u:744: tat sāmānyāt 'na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva samavanīyante' iti atra api abheda upacāreṇa dehāpādānasya eva utkramaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:745: yadi api prādhānyaṃ dehina iti vyākhyeyaṃ yeṣāṃ pañcamī pāṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:746: yeṣāṃ tu ṣaṣṭhīpāṭhaḥ teṣāṃ vidvat saṃbandhini utkrāntiḥ pratiṣidhyata iti prāpta utkrāntipratiṣedhārthatvāt asya vākyasya dehapādāna eva sā pratiṣiddhā bhavati,
GSP33brssbh4u:748: api ca 'cakṣuṣo vā mūrdhno vānyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhyastamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmati prāṇo 'nūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:749: iti evam avidvat viṣayaṃ saprapañcam utkramaṇaṃ saṃsāragamanaṃ ca darśayitvā 'iti nu kāmayamānaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.6)
GSP33brssbh4u:751: iti vyapadiśya vidvāṃsaṃ yadi tat viṣaye api utkrāntameva prāpadeyasamañjasa eva vyapadeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:752: tasmāt avidviṣaye prāptayoḥ gati utkrāntyoḥ vidvat viṣaye pratiṣedha iti evameva vyākhyeyaṃ vyapadeśārthavattvāya /
GSP33brssbh4u:753: na ca brahmavidaḥ sarvagatabrahmātmabhūtasya prakṣīṇakāmakarmaṇa utkrāntiḥ gatiḥ vā upapadyate nimitta abhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:754: 'atra brahma samaśnute' iti ca evañjātīyakāḥ śrutayo gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvaṃ sūcayanti // 13 //
GSP33brssbh4u:757: smaryate api ca mahābhārate gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvaḥ - 'sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya samyagbhūtāni paśyataḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:758: devā api mārge muhyantyapadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:759: nanu gatiḥ iti brahmavidaḥ sarvagatabrahmātmabhūtasya smaryate 'śukaḥ kila vaiyāsakirmumukṣurādityamaṇḍalamabhipratasthe pitrā cānugamyāhūto bho iti pratiśuśrāva' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:761: saśarīrasya eva ayaṃ yogabalena viśiṣṭadeśaprāptipūrvakaḥ śarīra utsarga iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:763: na hi aśarīraṃ gacchantaṃ sarvabhūtāni draṣṭuṃ śaknuyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:764: tathā ca tatra evaupasaṃhṛtam- 'śukastu mārutācchīghrāṃ gatiṃ kṛtvāntarikṣagaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:770: tāni pare tathā hy āha / BBs_4,2.15 /
GSP33brssbh4u:771: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditāni indriyāṇi bhūtāni ca parabrahmavidaḥ tasmin eva parasmin ātmani pralīyante /
GSP33brssbh4u:773: tathā hi āha śrutiḥ - 'evamevāsya paridraṣṭurimāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti (praśna. 6.5) iti.
GSP33brssbh4u:775: iti vidvat viṣaya eva aparā śrutiḥ parasmāt ātmanaḥ anyatra api kalānāṃ pralayam āha sma /
GSP33brssbh4u:778: pārthivādyāḥ kalāḥ pṛthivyādiḥ eva svaprakṛtīḥ apīyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:780: kṛtsnaṃ kalājātaṃ parabrahmavido brahma eva saṃpadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:785: sa puna- viduṣaḥ kalāpralayaḥ kim itareṣām iva sāvaśeṣo bhavati āhosvit niravaśeṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:786: tatra pralayasāmānyāt śakti avaśeṣatāprasaktau bravīti - avibhāgāpattiḥ eva iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:788: tathā hi kalāpralayam uktvā vakti - 'bhidyate tāsāṃ nāmarūpe puruṣa ityevaṃ procyate sa eṣo 'kalo 'mṛto bhavati' (pra. 6.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:789: avidyā nimittānāṃ ca kalānāṃ na vidyānimitte pralaye sāvaśeṣatva upapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:793: tadokograjvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāt taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogāc ca hārdānugṛhītāḥ śatādhikayā / BBs_4,2.17 /
GSP33brssbh4u:796: samānā ca asṛti upakramāt vidvat aviduṣoḥ utkrāntiḥiti uktaṃ tam idānīṃ sati upakramaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:797: tasya upasaṃhṛtavāgādi kalāpasya uccikramiṣato vijñānātmana oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayam 'sa etāstejomātrāḥ samabhyādadāno hṛdayamevānvavakrāmati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:798_0: tat agraprajvalanapūrvikā cakṣurādisthāna apādānā ca utkrāntiḥ śrūyate - 'tasya haitasya
GSP33brssbh4u:798_1: hṛdayasyāgraṃ pradyotate tena pradyotenaiṣa ātmā niṣkrāmati cakṣuṣo vā mūrdhno vānyebhyo
GSP33brssbh4u:799_0: sā kim aniyamena eva vidvat aviduṣoḥ bhavati atha asti kaścit viduṣo viśeṣaniyama
GSP33brssbh4u:799_1: iti vicikitsāyāṃ śruti aviśeṣāt aniyamaprāptau ācaṣṭe - samā api hi vidvat aviduṣoḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:799_2: hṛdayāgrapradyotane tat prakāśitadvāratve ca mūrdhasthānāt eva vidvān niṣkrāmati
GSP33brssbh4u:801: yadi vidvān apītaravat yataḥ kutaścit dehadeśāt utkrāmeta na eva utkṛṣṭaṃ lokaṃ labheta /
GSP33brssbh4u:803: tat śeṣagati anusmṛtiyogāt ca vidyāśeṣabhūtā ca mūrdhani anāḍīsaṃbaddhā gatiḥ anuśīlayitavyā vidyāviśeṣeṣu vihitā tām abhyasyan tasya eva pratiṣṭhita iti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:804: tasmāt hṛdayālayena brahmaṇā su upāsitena anugṛhītaḥ tadbhāvaṃ samāpanno vidvān mūrdhanyayā eva śatādhikayā śatāt atiriktayā ekaśatatamyā nāḍyā niṣkrāmati itarābhiḥ itare /
GSP33brssbh4u:805: tathā hi hārdavidyāṃ prakṛtya samāmananti - 'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyastāsāṃ mūrdhānamabhiniḥsṛtaikā /
GSP33brssbh4u:810: asti hārdavidyā - 'atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma' (chā. 8.1.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:812: tat prakriyāyām 'atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ' (chā. 8.6.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:813: iti upakramya saprapañcaṃ nāḍīraśmisaṃbandham uktvā uktam 'atha yatraitadasmāccharīrādutkrāmatyathaitaireva raśmibhirūrdhvamākramate' (chā. 8.6.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:815: tasmāt śatādhikayā nāḍyā niṣkrāman raśmi anusārī niṣkrāmati iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:816: tat kiṃm aviśeṣeṇa eva ahani rātrau vā mriyamāṇasya raśmi anusāritvam āhosvit ahani eva iti saṃśaye sati aviśeṣaśravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva tāvat raśmi anusāri iti pratijñāyate // 18 //
GSP33brssbh4u:818: niśi neti cen na sambandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvād darśayati ca / BBs_4,2.19 /
GSP33brssbh4u:819: asti ahani nāḍīraśmisaṃbandha iti ahani mṛtasya syāt raśmi anusāritvaṃ rātrau tu pretasya na syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:824: darśayati ca etamarthaṃ śrutiḥ - 'amuṣmādādityātpratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminnāditye sṛptāḥ' (chā. 8.6.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:825: iti nidāghasamaye ca niśāsu api kiraṇa anuvṛttiḥ upalabhyate pratāpādikāryadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:826: stoka anuvṛtteḥ tu durlakṣyatvam ṛtvantararajanīṣu śaiśireṣu iva durdineṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:828: yadi ca rātrau preto vinā eva raśmi anusāreṇa ūrdhvam ākrameta raśmi anusāra ānarthakyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh4u:829: na hi etat viśiṣya adhīyate yo divā praiti sa raśmīn apekṣya ūrdvam ākramate yaḥ tu rātrau saḥ anapekṣya eva iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:830: atha tu vidvān api rātriprāyaṇa aparādhamātreṇa na ūrdhvam ākrameta pākṣikaphalā vidyā iti apravṛttiḥ eva tasyāṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:832: atha api rātrau uparataḥ aharāgamam udīkṣeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:833: aharāgame api asya kadācit araśmisaṃbandhārhaṃ śarīraṃ syāt pāvakādisaṃparkāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:836: tasmāt tat aviśeṣeṇa eva idaṃ rātridivaṃ raśmi anusāritvam // 19 //
GSP33brssbh4u:840: ata eva ca udīkṣā anupapatteḥ apākṣikaphalatvāt ca vidyāyā aniyatakālatvāt ca mṛtyoḥ dakṣiṇa ayane api mriyamāṇo vidvān prāpnoti eva vidyāphalam /
GSP33brssbh4u:841: uttarāyaṇa maraṇa prāśasti aprasiddherbhīṣmasya ca pratīkṣādarśanāt 'āpūryamāṇapakṣādyānṣaḍudaṅṅeti māsāṃstān' (chā. 4.15.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:842: iti ca śruteḥ apekṣitavyam uttarāyaṇam iti imām āśaṅkām anena sūtreṇa apanudati /
GSP33brssbh4u:845: śruteḥ tu arthaṃ vakṣyati 'ātivāhikāstalliṅgāt' (bra. sū. 4.3.4) iti // 20 //
GSP33brssbh4u:846: nanu ca - 'yatra kāle tvanāvṛttimāvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:847: prayātā yānti taṃ phalaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha' (gī. 8.23)
GSP33brssbh4u:848: iti kālaprādhānyena upakramya aharādikālaviśeṣaḥ smṛtau apunarāvṛttaye niyamitaḥ kathaṃ rātrau dakṣiṇāyane vā prayāto anāvṛttiṃ yāyāditi /
GSP33brssbh4u:851: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryete smārte caite / BBs_4,2.21 /
GSP33brssbh4u:852: yoginaḥ prati ca ayam aharādikālaviniyogaḥ anāvṛttaye smaryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:853: smārte ca ete yogasāṃkhye na śraute /
GSP33brssbh4u:854: ato viṣayabhedāt pramāṇāviśeṣāt ca na asya smārtasya kālaviniyogasya śrauteṣu vijñāneṣu avatāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:857: iti ca śrautau etau devayānapitṛyāṇau pratyabhijñāyete smṛtau api iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:859: iti smṛtau kālapratijñānāt virodham āśaṅkya parihāra uktaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:860: yadā punaḥ smṛtau api agnyādyā devatā eva ativāhikyo gṛhyante tadā na kaścit virodha iti // 21 //
GSP33brssbh4u:861: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavataḥ kṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye caturthādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // 2 //
GSP33brssbh4u:864: atra pāde saguṇavidyāvato mṛtasya uttaramārga abhidhānam
GSP33brssbh4u:867: āsṛti upakramāt samāna utkrāntiḥ iti uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:872: 'yadā vai puruṣo 'smāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchati' (bṛ. 5.10.1) iti aparā /
GSP33brssbh4u:875: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ parasparaṃ bhinnā etāḥ sṛtaya kiṃ va eka eva anekaviśeṣaṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:876: tatra prāptaṃ tāvat bhinnāḥ etāḥ sṛtaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:881: tvarāvacanaṃ ca pīḍyeta 'sa yāvatkṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacchati' (chā. 8.6.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:882: tasmāt anyonyabhinnā eva ete panthāna iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:883: evaṃ prāpte abhidadhmahe - arcirādina iti - sarvo brahmaprepsuḥ arcirādina eva adhvanā raṃhati iti pratijānīmahe /
GSP33brssbh4u:885: prathito hi eṣa mārgaḥ sarveṣāṃ viduṣām /
GSP33brssbh4u:886: tathā hi pañcāgnividyāprakaraṇe 'ye 'cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:887: iti vidyāntaraśīlinām api arcirādikā sṛtiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:889: yāsu vidyāsu na kācit gatiḥ ucyate tāsu iyam arcirādika upatiṣṭhatāṃ yāsu tu anyā śrāvyate tāsu kim iti arcirādi āśrayaṇam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:890: atra ucyate - bhavet etadevaṃ yadi atyantabhinnā eva etāḥ sṛtayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:891: eka eva tu eṣā sṛtiḥanekaviśeṣaṇā brahmalokaprapadanī kvacit kenacit viśeṣaṇena upalakṣita iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:893: prakaraṇabhede api hi vidyā ekatve bhavati itaretara viśeṣaṇa upasaṃhāravat gativiśeṣaṇānām api upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:894: vidyābhede api tu gati ekadeśapratyabhijñānāt gantavya abhedāt ca gati abheda eva /
GSP33brssbh4u:895: tathā hi 'te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:897: 'sā yā brahmaṇo jitiryā vyuṣṭistāṃ jitiṃ jayati tāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ vyaśnute' (kauṣī. 1.4)
GSP33brssbh4u:899: iti ca tatra tatra tat eva ekaṃ phalaṃ brahmalokaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ pradarśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:900: yat tu etaiḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam arcirādi āśrayaṇe na syāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:903: na hi eka eva śabdo raśmīn ca prāpayitum arhati arcirādīn ca vyāvartayitum /
GSP33brssbh4u:904: tasmāt raśmisaṃbandha eva ayamavadhāryata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:905: tvarāvacanaṃ tu arcirādi apekṣāyām api gantavyāntarāpekṣā śaighryārthatvāt na uparudhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:908: iti mārgadvayabhraṣṭānāṃ kaṣṭaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sthānam ācakṣāṇā pitṛyāṇavyatiriktam ekameva devayānam arcirādiparvāṇaṃ panthānaṃ prathayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:909: bhūyāṃsi arcirādisṛtau mārgaparvāṇi alpīyāṃsi tu anyatra /
GSP33brssbh4u:910: bhūyasāṃ ca anuguṇyena alpīyasāṃ nayanaṃ nyāyyam iti ataḥ api arcirādinā tat prathiteḥ iti uktam // 1 //
GSP33brssbh4u:914: kena punaḥ saṃniveśaviśeṣeṇa gativiśeṣāṇānām itaretara viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti tat etat suhṛt bhūtvā ācāryo grathayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:915: 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokaṃ sa indralokaṃ sa prajāpatilokaṃ sa brahmalokam'(kau. 1.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:917: tatra arciḥ agnilokaśabdau tāvat ekārthau jvalanavacanatvāt iti na atra saṃniveśakramaḥ kvacit anveṣyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:918: vāyuḥ tu arcirādau vartmani na śrutaḥ katam asmin sthāne niveśayitavya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:920: iti atra saṃvatsarāt parāñcam ādityāt arvāñcaṃ vāyum abhisaṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:924_0: iti atrāviśeṣa upadiṣṭasya vāyoḥ śrutyantare viśeṣa upadośo dṛśyate 'yadā vai puruṣo
GSP33brssbh4u:924_1: 'smāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:924_2: tena sa ūrdhvamākramate sa ādityamāgacchati' (bṛ. 5.101) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:925: etasmāt ādityāt vāyoḥ pūrvatvadarśanāt viśeṣāt abda ādityayoḥ antarāle vāyuḥ niveśayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:926: kasmāt punaḥ agneḥ paratvadarśanāt viśeṣāt arciṣaḥ anantaraṃ vāyuḥ na niveśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:927: na eṣaḥ asti viśeṣa iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:928: nanu udāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokaṃ sa varuṇalokam' (kauṣī. 1.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:929: ucyate - kevala- atra pāṭhaḥ paurvāparyeṇāvasthito na atra kramavacanaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:931_0: padārtha upadarśanamātraṃ hi atra kriyate etam etaṃ ca āgacchati iti itaratra punaḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:931_1: vāyuprattena rathacakramātreṇa cchidreṇa ūrdhvam ākramya ādityam āgacchati iti avagamyate kramaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:935: tatra ādityān antaryāya devalokāt vāyum abhisaṃbhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:936: vāyum abdāt iti tu chandogaśruti apekṣayā uktam /
GSP33brssbh4u:937: chāndogya vājasaneyakayoḥ tu ekatra devaloko na vidyate paratra saṃvatsaraḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:938: tatra śrutidvayapratyayāt ubhau api ubhayatra grathayitavyau /
GSP33brssbh4u:939: tatra api māsasaṃbandhāt saṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo devaloka iti vivektavyam // 2 //
GSP33brssbh4u:944: iti asyā vidyuta upariṣṭāt sa varuṇalokam iti ayaṃ varuṇaḥ saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:946: yadā hi viśāla avidyutaḥ tīvraḥ tanitaniḥ ghoṣā jīmūta udareṣu pranṛtyanti āthāpaḥ prapatanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:949: apāṃ ca adhipatiḥ varuṇa iti śrutismṛtiprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:950: varuṇāt adhīndraprajāpatī sthānāntara abhāvāt pāṭhasāmarthyāt ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:951: ānantukatvāt api varuṇādīnām anta eva niveśo vaiśeṣikasthānābhāvāt vidyut ca antya arcirādau vartmani // 3 //
GSP33brssbh4u:955: teṣu eva arcirādiṣu saṃśayaḥ - kim etāni mārgacihnāni uta bhogabhūmayaḥ athavā netāro gantṛṇām iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:956: tatra mārgalakṣaṇabhūtā arcirādaya iti tāvat prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:958_0: yathā hi loke kaścit grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā pratiṣṭhāsamānaḥ anuśiṣyate gacchetaḥ tvam
GSP33brssbh4u:958_1: amuṃ giriṃ tato nyagrodhaṃ tato nadīṃ tato grāmaṃ tato nagaraṃ vā prāpsyasi iti evam
GSP33brssbh4u:958_2: iha api arciṣo aharahna āpūryamāṇapakṣim ityādi āha /
GSP33brssbh4u:961: lokaśabdaḥ ca prāṇināṃ bhogāyataneṣu bhāṣyate - 'manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devalokaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.16) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:962: tathā ca brāhmaṇam - 'ahorātreṣu te lokeṣu sajjante' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh4u:965: cetanā hi loke rājaniyuktāḥ puruṣā durgeṣu mārgeṣu ativāhyān ativāhayanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:966: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ātivāhikā eva ete bhavitum arhanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:968: tathā hi 'candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa etānbrahma gamayati' (chā. 4.15.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:970: tat vacanaṃ tat viṣayam eva upakṣīṇam iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:973: yadi arcirādiṣu puruṣā gamayitāraḥ prāptāḥ te ca mānavāḥ tato yuktaṃ tat nivṛttyarthaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇam amānava iti // 4 //
GSP33brssbh4u:978_0: ye tāvat arcirādimārgāḥ te dehaviyogāt saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇagrāmā iti asvatantrā arcirādīnām
GSP33brssbh4u:978_1: api acetanatvāt asvātantryam iti ataḥ arcirādi abhimāninaḥ cetanā devatāviśeṣā atiyātrāyāṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:979: loke api hi matta mūrcchitādayaḥ saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇāḥ paraprayuktavartmāno bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:980: anavasthitatvāt api arcirādīnāṃ na mārgalakṣaṇatva upapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:981: na hi rātrau pretasya ahaḥsvarūpa abhisaṃbhava upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:982: na ca pratipālanamasti iti uktaṃ purastāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:983: dhruvatvāt tu devatā ātmānāṃ na ayaṃ doṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:984: arcirādi śabdatā ca eṣām arcirādi abhimānāt upapadyate 'arciṣo 'haḥ'(chā. 4.15.5, 5,10.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:985: ityādinirdeśaḥ tu ativāhikatve api na virudhyate arciṣā hetunā ahaḥ abhisaṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:987: tathā ca loke prasiddheṣu api ativāhikeṣu evañjātīyaka upadeśo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:988: gaccha tvam ito balavarmāṇaṃ tato jayasiṃhaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇaguptam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:992: iti saṃbandhaviśeṣaḥ ativāhi ativāhakatva lakṣaṇa uktaḥ tena sa eva upakrame api iti nirdhāryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:993: saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇatvāt eva ca gantṛṣu na tatra upabhogasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:994: lokaśabdaḥ tu anupabhuñjāneṣu api gantṛṣu gamayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:996: ataḥ agnisvāmikaṃ lokaṃ prāptaḥ agninā ativāhyate vāyusvāmikaṃ prāpto vāyunā iti yojayitavyam // 5 //
GSP33brssbh4u:999: vidyuto hi adhi varuṇādaya upakṣiptā vidyutaḥ tu anantaramā brahmaprāpteḥ amānavasya eva puruṣasya gamayitṛtvaṃ śrutam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1002: tato vidyut abhisaṃbhavanāt ūrdhvaṃ vidyut anantaravartina eva amānavena puruṣeṇa varuṇalokādiṣu ativāhyamānā brahmalokaṃ gacchanti iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1003: 'tānvaidyutātpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa etya brahmalokaṃ gamayati' iti tasya eva gamayitṛtvaśruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1004: varuṇādayaḥ tu tasya eva apratibandhakaraṇena sāhāyya anuṣṭhānena vā kenacit anugrāhakā iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1005: tasmāt sādhu uktam ativāhikā devatātmānaḥ arcirādaya iti // 6 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1010: iti atra vicikitsyate - kiṃ kāryam aparaṃ brahma gamayati āhosvit param eva avikṛtaṃ mukhyaṃ brahma iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1013: tatra kāryameva saguṇam aparaṃ brahma enān gamayati amānavaḥ puruṣa iti bādariḥ ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1016: asya hi kāryabrahmaṇo gantavyatvam upapadyate pradeśavattvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1017: na tu parasmin brahmaṇi gantṛtvaṃ gantavyatvaṃ gatiḥ vā avakalpate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1021: brahmalokāngamayati te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:1022: iti ca śrutyantare viśeṣitatvāt kāryabrahmaviṣaya eva gatiḥ iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1023: nahi bahuvacanena viśeṣaṇaṃ parasmin brahmaṇi avakalpate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1024: kārye tu avasthābheda upapatteḥ saṃbhavati bahuvacanam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1025: lokaśrutiḥ api vikāragocarāyāma eva saṃniveśaviśiṣṭāyāṃ bhogabhūmāvau āñjasī /
GSP33brssbh4u:1026: gauṇī tu anyatra 'brahmaiva loka eṣa samrāṭ' ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:1027: adhikaraṇa adhikartavyanirdeśaḥ api parasmin brahmaṇi anāñjasaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1030: nanu kāryaviṣaye api brahmaśabdo na upapadyate samanvaye hi samastasya jagato janmādikāraṇaṃ sthāpitam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1034: parabrahmasāmīpyāt aparasya brahmaṇaḥ tasmin api brahmaśabdaprayogo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1035: param eva hi brahma viśuddha upādhisaṃbandhaṃ kvacit kaiścit vikāradharmaiḥ manomayatvādibhiḥ upāsanāya upadiśyamānam aparam iti sthitiḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1038: na hi parasmāt brahmaṇaḥ anyatra kvacit nityatāṃ saṃbhāvayanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1039: darśayati ca devayānena pathā prasthitānām anāvṛttim /
GSP33brssbh4u:1041: iti teṣām iha na punarāvṛttiḥ asti 'tayordhvamāyannamṛtatvameti' (chā. 8.6.6), ka. 6.16) iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:1043: kāryātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥ param abhidhānāt / BBs_4,3.10 /
GSP33brssbh4u:1044: kāryabrahmalokapralayapratyupasthāne sati tatra eva utpannasamyagdarśanāḥ santaḥ tat adhyakṣeṇa hiraṇyagarbheṇa sahātaḥ paraṃ pariśuddhaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1046: na hi āñjasa eva gatipūrvikā paraprāptiḥ saṃbhavati iti upapaditam // 10 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1049: smṛtiḥ api etam artham anujānāti - 'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33brssbh4u:1051: tasmāt kāryabrahmaviṣayā gatiḥ śrūyata iti siddhāntaḥ // 11 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1053: kaṃ puna- pūrvapakṣam āśaṅkya ayaṃ siddhāntaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ 'kāryaṃ bādariḥ' (bra.sū. 4.3.7)
GSP33brssbh4u:1058: iti atra parameva brahma prāpayati iti manyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1060: paraṃ hi brahma brahmaśabdasya mukhyam ālambanaṃ,
GSP33brssbh4u:1067: amṛtatvaṃ ca parasmin brahmaṇi upapadyate na kārye,
GSP33brssbh4u:1071: paraviṣaya eva ca eṣā gatiḥ kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1072: na hi tatra vidyāntaraprakramaḥ asti 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' (ka. 2.14)
GSP33brssbh4u:1077: iti na ayaṃ kāryaviṣayaḥ pratipatti abhisaṃdhiḥ 'nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1078: iti kāryavilakṣaṇasya parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1083: iti ca parasya eva brahmaṇo yaśonāmatva prasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1084: 'sā ceyaṃ veśmapratipattirgatipūrvikā hārdavidyāyāmuditā tadaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam' (chā. 8.5.3) iti atra /
GSP33brssbh4u:1085: paderapi ca gatyarthatvāt mārga apekṣā avasīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1087: tau etau dvau pakṣau ācāryeṇa sūtritau gati upapattyādibhiḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:1089: tatra gati upapattyādayaḥ prabhavanti mukhyatvādīna ābhāsayituṃ na tu mukhyatvādayo gati upapattyādīn ityādya eva siddhānto vyākhyāto dvitīyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1090: na hi asati api saṃbhave mukhyasya eva arthasya grahaṇam iti kaścit ājñāpayitā vidyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1091: paravidyāprakaraṇe api ca tat stutyarthaṃ vidyāntara āśrayagati anukīrtanam upapadyate 'viṣvaṅṅanyā utkramaṇe bhavanti' (chā. 8.6.6) itivat /
GSP33brssbh4u:1093: iti tu pūrvavākyavicchedena kārye api pratipatti abhisaṃdhiḥ na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1094: saguṇe api ca brahmaṇi sarvātmatva saṃkīrtanaṃ sarvakarmā sarvakāma ityādivat avakalpate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1096_0: kecit punaḥ pūrvāṇi pūrvapakṣasūtrāṇi bhavanti uttarāṇi siddhāntasūtrāṇi iti etāṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:1096_1: vyavasthānam anurudhyamānāḥ paraviṣayā eva gatiśrutīḥ pratiṣṭhāpayanti tat anupapannaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:1097: yat sarvagataṃ sarvāntaraṃ sarvātmakaṃ ca paraṃ brahma 'ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ' 'yatsākṣādaparokṣādbrahma' (bṛ. 3.4.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1101: ityādi śrutinirdhārita viśeṣaṃ tasya gantavyatā na kadācit api upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1103: anyo hi anyat gacchati iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssbh4u:1104: nanu loke gatasya api gantavyatā deśāntaraviśiṣṭā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1105: yathā pṛthivīstha eva pṛthivīṃ deśāntaradvāreṇa gacchati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1106: tathā ananyatve api sarvaśakti upetatvāt kathañcit gantavyatā syāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1114: ityādi śruti smṛti nyāyebhyo na deśakālādi viśeṣayogaḥ paramātmani kalpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1115: yena bhūpradeśa vayovasthā nyāyena asya gantavyatā syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1116: bhūvayasoḥ tu pradeśa avasthādi viśeṣayogāt upapadyate deśa kāla viśiṣṭā gantavyatā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1117: jagat utpatti sthiti pralayahetutva śruteḥ anekaśaktitvaṃ brahmaṇa iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:1120: utpattyādiśrutīnām api samānam ananyārthatvam iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:1123: mṛdādi dṛṣṭāntaiḥ hi sato brahmaṇa ekasya satyatvaṃ vikārasya ca āvṛtatvaṃ pratipādayat śāstraṃ na utpattyādiparaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1124: kasmāt punaḥ utpattyādi śrutīnāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ na punaḥ itara śeṣatvam itarāsām iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1126: na hi ātmana ekatva nityatva śuddhatvādi avagatau satyāṃ bhūyaḥ kācit ākāṅkṣā upajāyate puruṣārthasamāptibuddhi upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1130: etaṃ ha vāva na tapati kimahaṃ sādhu nākaravaṃ kimahaṃ pāpamakaravam' (taitti. 2.9.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1132: tathā eva ca viduṣāṃ tuṣṭi anubhavādi darśanāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1133: vikāra anṛta abhisaṃdhi apavādāt ca 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1134: ato na viśeṣanirākaraṇa śrutīnām anyaśeṣatvam avagantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1135: na evam utpattyādi śrutīnāṃ nirākāṅkṣārtha pratipādanasāmarthyam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1137: tathā hi 'tatraitacchruṅgamutpatitaṃ somya vijānīhi nedamamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati' (chā. 6.8.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1138: iti upanyasya udarke sata eva ekasya jagat mūlasya vijñeyatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1143: evam utpattyādiśrutīnām aikātmya avagamaparatvāt na anekaśaktiyogo brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1146: iti ca parasmin brahmaṇi gatiṃ nivārayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1148: gatikalpanāyāṃ ca gantā jīvo gantavyasya brahmaṇaḥ avayavo vikāro vā tataḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1152: yadi ekadeśaḥ tena ekadeśino nityaprāptatvāt na punaḥ brahmagamanam upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1153: ekadeśitva kalpanā ca brahmaṇi anupapannā niravayavatva prasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1154: vikārapakṣe api etat atulyaṃ vikāreṇa api vikāriṇo nityaprāptatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1155: na hi ghaṭo mṛdātmatāṃ parityajya avatiṣṭhate parityāge vā abhāvaprāpteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1156: vikāra avayavapakṣayoḥ ca tadvataḥ sthiratvāt brahmaṇaḥ saṃsāragamanam api anavakḷptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1158: saḥ aṇuḥ vyāpī madyama parimāṇo vā bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1162: pratiṣiddhe ca aṇutva madhyama parimāṇatve vistareṇa purastāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1165: vikāra avayavapakṣayoḥ api samānaḥ ayaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1166: vikāra avayavayoḥ tadvatoḥ ananyatvāt adoṣa iti cet /
GSP33brssbh4u:1173_0: yat tu kaiścit jalpyate nityāni naimittikāni karmāṇi anuṣṭhīyante pratyavāya anutpattaye
GSP33brssbh4u:1173_1: kāmyāni pratiṣiddhāni ca parihriyante svarganarakān avāptaye sāṃpratadeha upabhogyāni
GSP33brssbh4u:1173_2: ca karmāṇi upabhogena eva kṣapyanta ityato vartamānadehapātāt ūrdhvaṃ dehāntara pratisaṃdhāna
GSP33brssbh4u:1173_3: kāraṇa abhāvāt svarūpa avasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kaivalyaṃ vinā api brahmātmataya evaṃvṛttasya setsyati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1176: na hi etat śāstreṇa kenacit pratipāditaṃ mokṣārthi itthaṃ samācaret iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1177: svamanīṣayā tu etat tarkitaṃ yasmāt karmanimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ tasmāt nimitta abhāvāt na bhaviṣyati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1178: na ca etat tarkayitum api śakyate nimitta abhāvasya durjñānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1179: bahūni hi karmāṇi jātyantarasaṃcitāni iṣṭa aniṣṭavipākāni ekaikasya jantoḥ saṃbhāvyante /
GSP33brssbh4u:1180_0: teṣāṃ viruddha phalānāṃ yugapat upabhoga asaṃbhavāt kānicit labdha avasarāṇi idaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:1180_1: janma nirmimate kānicit tu deśakālanimittapratīkṣāṇi asata iti ataḥ teṣām avaśiṣṭānāṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:1180_2: sāṃpratena upabhogena kṣapaṇāsaṃbhavāt na yathāvarṇitacaritasya api vartamānadehapāte
GSP33brssbh4u:1181: karmaśeṣasadbāvasiddhaḥ ca 'tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇāstataḥ śeṣeṇa' ityādi śruti smṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1183: nitya naimittikāni teṣāṃ kṣepakāṇi bhaviṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1187: na ca janmāntara saṃcitānāṃ sukṛtānāṃ nitya naimittikaiḥ asti virodhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1189: duritānāṃ tu aśuddhirūpatvāt sati virodhe bhavatu kṣapaṇaṃ na tu tāvatā dehāntara nimitta abhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1192: na ca nitya naimittikānuṣṭhānāt pratyavāya anutpattimātraṃ na punaḥ phalāntara utpattiḥ iti pramāṇam asti phalāntarasya api anuniṣpādinaḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1193: smarati hi āpastambaḥ - 'tadyathāmre phalārte nimitte chāyāgandhāvanūtpadyete evaṃ dharmaṃ caryamāṇārthā anūtpadyante' iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1194: na ca asati samyak darśane sarvātmanā kāmyapratiṣiddhavarjanaṃ janmaprāyaṇāntarālaṃ kenacit pratijñātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1196: saṃśayitavyaṃ tu bhavati tathā api nimitta abhāvasya durjñānatvameva /
GSP33brssbh4u:1197: na ca anabhyupagamyamāne jñānagamye brahmātmatve kartṛtva bhoktṛtva svabhāvasya ātmanaḥ kaivalyam ākāṅkṣituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:1200: kartṛtva bhoktṛtva kāryam anartho na tat śaktiḥ tena śakti avasthāne 'pi kāryaparihārat upapanno mokṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1203: atha api syāt na kevalā śaktiḥ kāryam ārabhate anapekṣya anyāni nimittāni /
GSP33brssbh4u:1204: ata ekākinī sā sthitāpi na aparādhyati iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1207: tasmāt kartṛtva bhoktṛtva svabhāve satyām anyasatyāṃ vidyāgamyāyāṃ brahmātmatāyāṃ na kathañcana mokṣaṃ pratyāśā asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1210: parasmāt ananyatve api jīvasya sarvavyavahāra lopaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1214: śāstraṃ ca 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati (bṛ. 2.4.14, 4.5.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:1215: ityādinā aprabuddhaviṣaye pratyakṣādi vyavahāram uktvā punaḥ prabuddhaviṣaye 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 2.4.14, 4.5.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:1217: tat evaṃ parabrahmavido gantavyādi vijñānasya bādhitatvāt na kathañcana gatiḥ upapādayituṃ śakyā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1220: tathā hi kvacit pañcāgnividyāṃ prakṛtya gatiḥ ucyate yathā 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' (chā. 4.10.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:1222: iti ca tatra api vāmanītvādibhiḥ satyakāmādibhiḥ ca guṇaiḥ saguṇasya eva upāsyatvāt saṃbhavati gatiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1223: na kvacit parabrahmaviṣayā gatiḥ śrāvyate yathā gatipratiṣedhaḥ śrāvitaḥ 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1225_0: ityādiṣu tu satyapi āpnoteḥ gatyarthatve varṇitena nyāyena deśāntaraprāpti asaṃbhavāt
GSP33brssbh4u:1225_1: svarūpapratipattiḥ eva iyam avidyā adhyāropita nāma rūpa pravilaya apekṣayā abhidhīyate
GSP33brssbh4u:1227: api ca paraviṣayā gatiḥ vyākhyāyamānā prarocanāya vā syāt anucintanāya vā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1230: svasaṃvedyena eva avyavahitena vidyāsamarpitena svāsthyena tat siddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1231: na ca nityasiddhaniḥśreyasanivedanasya asādhyaphalasya vijñānasya gati anucintane kācit apekṣā upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1233: tatra para aparabrahmaviveka anavadhāraṇena aparasmin brahmaṇi vartamānā gatiśrutayaḥ parasmin adhyāropyante /
GSP33brssbh4u:1234: kiṃ dve brahmaṇī param aparaṃ ca iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1235: bāḍhaṃ dve 'etadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ brahmayadoṅkāraḥ' (pra. 5.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:1237: kiṃ punaḥ paraṃ brahma kim aparam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1239: yatra avidyākṛta nāma rūpādi viśeṣapratiṣedhāt asthūlādiśabdaiḥ brahma upadiśyate tat param /
GSP33brssbh4u:1240: tat eva yatra nāmarūpādiviśeṣeṇa kenacit viśiṣṭam upāsanāya upadiśyate 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ' (chā. 3.14.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:1245: tasya ca aparabrahma upāsanasya tat saṃnidhau śrūyamāṇam 'sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati' (chā. 8.2.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1246: ityādi jagat aiśvaryalakṣaṇaṃ saṃsāragocaram eva phalaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1248: tasya ca deśaviśeṣa avabaddhatvāt tatprāptyarthaṃ gamanam aviruddham /
GSP33brssbh4u:1249: sarvagatatve api ca ātmana ākāśasya iva ghaṭādigamane budhyādi upādhigamane gamanaprasiddhiḥ iti avādiṣma 'tadguṇasāratvāt' (bra.sū. 2.3.29) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh4u:1253: iti tu pakṣāntarapratibhānamātrapradarśanaṃ prajñāvikāsanāya iti draṣṭavyam // 14 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1256: apratīkālambanān nayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā ca doṣāt tatkratuś ca / BBs_4,3.15 /
GSP33brssbh4u:1257: sthitam etat kāryaviṣayā gatiḥ na paraviṣayā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1258: idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate kiṃ sarvān vikāra ālambanān aviśeṣeṇa eva amānavaḥ puruṣaḥ prāpayati brahmalokam uta kāṃścit eva iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1259: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ sarveṣām eva eṣāṃ viduṣām anyatra parasmāt brahṇaṇo gatiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1261: iti atrāviśeṣeṇa eva eṣāṃ vidyāntareṣu avatārita iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1262: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - apratīka ālambanān iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1263: pratīka ālambanān varjayitvā sarvān anyān vikāra ālambanān nayati brahmalokam iti bādarāyaṇa ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1266: aniyama nyāyasya pratīkavyatirikteṣu api upāsaneṣu upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1267: tatkratuḥ ca asya ubhayathābhāvasya samarthako hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1268: yo hi brahmakratuḥ sa brāhmam aiśvaryam āsīdediti śliṣyate 'taṃ yathā yatopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1269: na tu pratīkeṣu brahma akratutvam asti pratīkapradhānatvāt upāsanasya /
GSP33brssbh4u:1270: nanu abrahmakratuḥ api brahmagacchati iti śrūyate yathā pañcāgni vidyāyām 'sa enānbrahma gamayati' (chā. 4.15.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:1271: iti bhavatu yatra evam āhatyavāda upalabhyate tat abhāve tu autsargikeṇa tat kratunyāyena brahmakratūnām eva tatprāptiḥ na itareṣām iti gamyate // 15 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1274: nāmādiṣu pratīka upāsaneṣu pūrvasmāt pūrvasmāt phalaviśeṣam uttarasmin uttarasmin upāsane darśayati - 'yāvannāmno gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati' (chā. 7.1.5)
GSP33brssbh4u:1279: sa ca ayaṃ phalaviśeṣaḥ pratīka tantratvāt upāsanānām upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1280: brahma tantratve tu brahmaṇaḥ aviśiṣṭatvāt kathaṃ phalaviśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1281: tasmāt na pratīka ālambanānām itaraiḥ tulyaphalatvam iti // 16 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1288: evam eva eṣa saṃprasādaḥ asmāt śarīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1289: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ devalokādi upabhogasthāneṣu iva āgantukena kenacit viśeṣeṇa abhiniṣpadyata āhot ātmamātreṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1291: sthānāntareṣu iva āgantukena kenacit rūpeṇa abhiniṣpattiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1294: svarūpamātreṇa cet abhiniṣpattiḥ pūrvāsu api avasthāsu svarūpa anāpāyāt vibhāvyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:1296: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - kevalena eva ātmana āvirbhavati na dharmāntareṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1297: kutaḥ - svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata iti svaśabdāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1298: anyathā hi svaśabdena iti viśeṣaṇam anavakḷptaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1302: yena eva hi kenacit rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate tasya eva ātmīyatva upapatteḥ svena iti viśeṣaṇamna arthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1303: ātmavacanatāyāṃ tu arthavat kevalena eva ātmarūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate na āgantukena apararūpeṇāpi iti // 1 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1305: kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ pūrvāsu avasthāsu iha ca svarūpa anapāyasāmye sati ityata āha -
GSP33brssbh4u:1307: yaḥ atra abhiniṣpadyata iti uktaḥ sa sarvabandha vinirmuktaḥ śuddhena eva ātmanā avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1308: pūrvatra tu andho bhavati api roditi iva vināśameva apīto bhavati iti ca avasthātraya kaluṣitena ātmana iti ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:1309: kathaṃ punaḥ avagamyate muktaḥ ayam idānīṃ bhavati iti - pratijñānāt ityāha /
GSP33brssbh4u:1311: iti avasthātraya doṣavihīnam ātmānaṃ vyākhyeyatvena pratijñāya 'aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ (chā. 8.12.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1312: iti ca upanyasya 'svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ' (chā. 8.12.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1316: phalatvaprasiddhiḥ api mokṣasya bandhanivṛttimātra apekṣā na apūrva upajanana apekṣā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1317: yat api abhiniṣpadyata iti utpattiparyāyatvaṃ tat api pūrva avasthāpekṣaṃ yathā roganivṛttau arogaḥabhiniṣpadyata iti tadvat /
GSP33brssbh4u:1321: kathaṃ punaḥ mukta iti ucyate - yāvatā 'paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya' (chā. 8.12.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1324: na ca anativṛtto vikāraviṣayāt kaścit mukto bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1327: yata jyotiḥ śabdena āvedyate prakaraṇāt 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyuḥ' (chā. 8.7.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:1328: iti hi prakṛte parasmin ātmani na akasmāt bhautikaṃ jyotiḥ śakyaṃ grahītum /
GSP33brssbh4u:1330: jyotiḥśabdaḥ tu ātmani api dṛśyate 'taddevā jyotiṣaṃ jyotiḥ (bṛ. 4.4.16) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1335: paraṃ jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate yaḥ sa kiṃ parasmāt ātmanaḥ pṛthageva bhavati uta avibhāgena eva avatiṣṭhata vīkṣāyām sa 'tatra paryeti' ( 8.12.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1336: iti adhikaraṇa adhikartavya nirdeśāt jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya (chā. 8.12.3)
GSP33brssbh4u:1337: iti ca kartṛkarmanirdeśāt bhedena eva avasthānam iti yasya matiḥ taṃ vyutpādayati avibhakta eva pareṇa ātmanā muktaḥ avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1343: iti evamādīni vākyāni avibhāgena eva paramātmānaṃ darśayanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1344: yathādarśanam eva ca phalaṃ yuktaṃ tatkratu nyāyāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1346: evaṃ muneḥ vijānata ātmā bhavati gautama' (ka. 4.15)
GSP33brssbh4u:1347: iti ca evamādīni muktasvarūpanirūpaṇaparāṇi vākyāni avibhāgameva darśayanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1357: iti atra ātmamātrarūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata na āgantukena apararūpeṇa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1358_0: adhunā tu tat viśeṣabubhutsāyām abhidhīyate svam asya rūpaṃ brāhmam apahatapāpmatvādi
GSP33brssbh4u:1358_1: satyasaṃkalpatva avasānaṃ tathā sarvajñatvaṃ sarveśvaratvaṃ ca tena svarūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata
GSP33brssbh4u:1362: iti evam antena upanyāsena evam ātmakatām ātmano bodhayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1365: 'tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' (chā. 7.25.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh4u:1366: 'sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ' ityādi vyapadeśāḥ ca evam upapannā bhaviṣyanti iti // 5 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1369: yadyapi apahapāpmatvādayobhedena eva dharmā nirdiśyante tathā api śabdavikalpajā eva ete /
GSP33brssbh4u:1371: caitanyameva tu asya ātmanaḥ svarūpam iti tanmātreṇa svarūpeṇa abhiniṣpattiḥ yuktā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1372: tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'evaṃ vā are 'yamātmānantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva' (bṛ. 4.5.13)
GSP33brssbh4u:1374: satyakāmatvādayaḥ tu yadi api vastusvarūpeṇa eva dharmā ucyante satyāḥ kāmā asya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1375: tathā api upādhisaṃbandha adhīnatvāt teṣāṃ na caitanyavat svarūpasaṃbhavaḥ /
